review:
Very cool little title, played it in 2015, just beat the shit out of it today. Grind's pretty brisk, upgrade your archers (longest range at the start of the game, 360 firing arc, fast fire) and get your party limit members up, don't bother with upgrading any other dudes until you get the witch doctors, upgrade your DPS cooldown and you're off to the races when you get the golden axe.

Go ahead and give it a go.

review:
It's not a terrible game, but there are much more fun and less grindy alternatives on the market today.

The main reason I am giving this a thumbs down though is due to how buggy Bardbarian is. The programming team did a bad job here, and if you use a controller you will have to frequently restart the game because buttons randomly stop working or your left trigger mysteriously becomes stuck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083072881', 'num_games_owned': 2263, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 510, 'last_played': 1673464970}
review:
Перед нами веселый представитель мобильных игр и в этом формате ему бы и оставаться, на ПеКа выглядит слишком просто, но простота её обманчива. Под эндгейм, так сказать, игра неплохо начинает проверять скилл и реакцию. Случайно наткнулся в библиотеке когда искал во что бы такое казуальное бахнуть часик-два. Оказывается, сей продукт был куплен аж в 2015 году за целых 28 рублей! И покрылся мхом и пылью. Всковырнул крышечку и распаковал, чтобы понять, почему игра у меня до сих пор не помечена как пройденная или скрытая...
Игра не зря имеет весьма неплохие оценки, играется бодро, весело и концепт бодрой Хеви музыки весьма неплохо раскрыт в контексте геймплея. Хотя затяжные анимации кастов, так же связанные с музыкальной частью, часто роняют ритмику игры и начинают со временем надоедать. Под конец сложность заметно повышается и одно неверное движение может отправить вас на "пересдачу". Что со временем начнёт поджигать 5ю точку. При том что есть еще и уровень Insane. Есть ряд весьма хардкорных ачивок.
Подытожим. Веселый и бодрый проект, но который может внезапно надоесть. Хотелось бы что-то такое же пощупать, но чуть более продуманное и мясное. Наверное даже порекомендую любителям казуальщинки попробовать свой скилл в этом мультяшном приключении.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009634062', 'num_games_owned': 1057, 'num_reviews': 406, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1696476062}
review:
Give it some time to ramp up to speed, maybe an hour and a half, then choose whether you like it. So glad I gave this game some extra time. I didn't like it at first, and not a fan of the art style. But, I played it enough to see,

Its far different enough from all other titles in this Genera, which is what makes it worth your time/ $$.

The baddies even mostly shoot back. All the possible party members... good stuff. Also not a fan of the music, but it starts to grow on ya, and is... enduring after a bit.

Probably get it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013806302', 'num_games_owned': 3994, 'num_reviews': 166, 'playtime_forever': 702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 702, 'last_played': 1659226351}
review:
It's interesting that I decided to play this game in 2022 because it feels like the grandfather of a big hit this year, Vampire Survivors. It is not really a tower defense despite the popularity of the tag, there is something to defend but you don't build towers, pathing is not important and you are actually a target. It's closer to a casual bullet hell in my opinion. Remove the town crystal and make your units invincible and this would have been Vampire Survivors Lite many years in advance.

The game gets repetitive, especially on normal difficulty and because of the rogue-lite elements but it is short enough that it's not a detriment unless you go for all the achievements like I did. Around half my playtime is for getting enough gold to unlock everything for the last achievement.

Nice cute artstyle and it's easy to pick up that "axe" and start jamming.

review:
A short, yet enjoyable take on the tower-defense & bullet-hell genres.
Lots of different units, upgrades and boosts. Music is good albeit repetitive.
I had hoped a game about being a bard would have more music variety, but the game is still fun.
I don't really see myself returning to play it.

100% achievements in 7.2 hours.
Rating: 7/10 - It's enjoyable enough to get on sale, if you're intrigued.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993531522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 347, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1483444220}
review:
A strange little Action Tower Defense game where you control a hero with a bunch of minions / pets who scurry around killing enemies who travel from right to left in an effort to destroy your base. 

It's a rogue-like / grind-based game where you collect gold or whatever and then use it to level-up so it becomes gradually easier to kill increasingly more powerful enemies. It's nothing special but I played it for five and a half hours so it must have some appeal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017198694', 'num_games_owned': 1997, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 861, 'last_played': 1648709583}
review:
If there were a Neutral rating, that's what I'd give this game. In the end, after finishing the game I felt a wave of relief wash over me. Some games I'm sad when there's no more to do, in this case I felt happy to be done. So I'll let that final feeling guide me here and give it a thumbs down. I had fun, but in the end I could have had more fun with a different game.

It's a very well polished and well developed game. You are the bard and as you walk around playing your music, your team of recruits follow you about attacking the enemies approaching your town crystal. Their movement is not tightly controlled but it does remind me a little of a game of "snake." As you dodge attacks your party loosely follows you. There's a bit of a trick/wiggle you do to make sure your party also dodge those attacks but there's certainly an art to it. As you play your music, a counter goes up and this allows you to recruit more units.

There are lots of unit classes to pick from but they are unlocked as you play. You also collect gold as you play and can spend it on upgrades for your next playthrough. You can upgrade your units, your personal abilities (health, max team size, song effects), and the town you're defending. The real issue I see here is that when you unlock new classes, the new ones are either worthless or completely better than the previous ones. It's not just that they aren't as good, but you are also limited to three unit classes per game, so you just don't have room to use them. While you do eventually unlock a fourth unit slot by beating the main story, you're all but done at that time.

In the end, the idea is a fun one, but the game feels a bit too passive with too little control over your units and not enough variety in strategy. The upgrades are pretty easy to get and max out quickly as well. There's an endless story mode that unlocks when you beat the game but it's just more of what you've already been doing because there are no new unit types anymore.

What would help a lot with the end game would be a way to keep upgrading your units. When you unlock the endless story mode you can do one more upgrade and then that's it. It would be nice if we could keep upgrading our units indefinitely to keep pushing forward. Two solutions come to mind. The most straightforward would be to just keep increasing the upgrade limit each new round/loop/etc. A more interesting approach would be to set up an exponential price increase to allow us to continue upgrading our units. The lower tier heroes could increase in cost more slowly so that they become viable again in the end game. It would allow us to upgrade our favorite units to crazy levels so we can play them in the end game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037577347', 'num_games_owned': 1911, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 781, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 781, 'last_played': 1644711294}
review:
Bueno estamos ante un juego que podría pasar por juego de móvil perfectamente xD.

Este juego tiene diferentes modos de juego pero el principal es el clásico "Tower Defense", es decir, aguantar por oleadas en un mapa una serie de enemigos, mientras vamos mejorando las características de los aliados para así, ir pudiendo avanzar cada vez de una forma más fácil por las fases hasta llegar a los jefes finales de cada una de ellas. 
La diferencia que tiene este juego con otros tower defense, en los cuales tu simplemente te dedicas a poner defensas en el mapa, como puede ser un Plant vs Zombies. Es que tu eres un bardo que toca el laúd y vas invocando a las unidades. Las cuales irán alrededor tuyo siempre y tienes que ir desplazándote hasta los puntos donde aparecen los enemigos (de los cuales habrá de diferentes tipos y tendrán diferentes ataques) para acabar con ellos antes de que lleguen al centro de tu ciudad y rompan tu nexo.
La mecánica del juego es bastante entretenida para echar unas horas, pero luego puede volverse monótono una vez desbloqueemos las mejoras y nos pasemos la historia. Que aún así, como digo tienes otros modos de juego como: ir sobreviviendo en un mapa con lo que te vayan dando a oleadas de enemigos o un modo de desplazamiento de pantalla lateral en el que tienes que evitar ir lento y que la pantalla te pille, mientras sorteas un escenario de enemigos y de obstáculos que pueden liártela fácilmente. Así como, una vez nos pasemos el juego, obtendremos un modo de dificultad mayor en el cual nos darán más mejoras para aumentar las estadísticas de nuestros personajes e items para resistir las oleadas.

En resumen un juego entretenido para unas horas y que merece la pena xD.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287450599', 'num_games_owned': 691, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 952, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1636475507}

author: {'steamid': '76561198077656464', 'num_games_owned': 1222, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 969, 'last_played': 1610501698}
review:
Pretty decent game considering the price. It's no masterpiece, but will easily give you a dozen or so hours. From a cheap flash game, you can't ask for much more. Could be a good pickup if included in a bundle. 6/10.

For completionists, I was annoyed I had to restart progress to enter hard mode and get all the achievements. Reasonably challenging all things considered.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198655669', 'num_games_owned': 2075, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 648, 'last_played': 1630167660}
review:
A fun and unique game where the main character is a support unit. There are 16 total units to buy and upgrade, as well as upgrading your hero and town. There's a lot of choices in this game such as which unit to pick in your squad, you can three different units and a maximum of nine, so you could have one healer, and seven archers and one tank. There are four modes, Story, Survival, Escape, and Day 2. 
Story mode is split up into four levels, Morning, Noon, Evening, and Night. In this mode you'll defend your town crystal by defeating enemies that appear on the right side of the screen and are shown as red dots on the map at the top of the screen. Day 2 is the same as story mode, but a lot harder.
Survival mode is akin to a bullet hell mode, where instead of bringing units with you, you collect them similar to objects found in Story mode and you dodge an increasingly large number of units.
Escape is where you dodge obstacles, be it lava pits or attacks from enemies. The game has hours of content and is worth every penny.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061314668', 'num_games_owned': 1279, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 1410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1410, 'last_played': 1507248335}
review:
Bardbarian es un tower defense en el que tu misión como bardo es defender a golpe de laúd al pueblo de una amenaza de monstruos.
La mecánica no es de un tower defense clásico o un [i]Plants vs Zombies[/i] en el que colocas unidades y son ellas quienes hacen de barrera o torreta, sino que TÚ invocas las unidades con combinaciones de teclas (recomiendo jugar con mando) y tienes que ir desplazándote por el escenario esquivando todo tipo de proyectiles y ataques para no morir y permitir que los magos, arqueros, sacerdotes...en resumen, TODO lo que tengas alrededor, ataque a los enemigos.

Puedes desbloquear mejoras que ayudan bastante sobretodo en los niveles avanzados de la campaña (vencer oleadas cada vez mayores y más complicadas para salvar tu pueblo) o para los otros, como por ejemplo el modo supervivencia.

También puedes mejorar las unidades y hacer en partida un guitarreo para aumentar tu fuerza, defensa, velocidad o ponerte modo destroyer cuando se llene el indicador.

El título del juego no sólo hace referencia a que tu personaje es un bárbaro, sino que todo se activa o cada personaje se invoca tras una animación de Brad (tú) con su instrumento. Una animación muy cuidada en un estilo gráfico bonito y simple.
[i]Bardbarian y cómo Brad el bárbaro bardo protege su aldea.[/i]

Es ideal para distraerte y destruir cuando estás agobiado. Las horas de juego que figuran fueron para completar el juego al 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050338220', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1643, 'last_played': 1608991190}
review:
This is a pretty funny tower defense game. 

You play as Brad, a barbarian who decides to be a bard. (bard-barian, hur hur hur)
And with the companions you call in, you can make several builds to kill enemies. 
What distinguishes this game from other tower defense games, is that you can move freely around. 

And there is of course a lot of music involved. Certainly recommended when you like electric guitar. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198078995787', 'num_games_owned': 287, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1600121804}
review:
Jogo simples, mas ótimo pra passar o tempo, lembra muito os jogos em flash da época que o click jogos bombava muito. Mecânica repetitiva, mas com um progressão bastante expressiva, visto que você sempre está desbloqueando coisas novas e/ou melhorando o que já possui.
A trilha sonora do jogo é boa, mas repetitiva depois de 1-2h pois não muda, ou mudo POUQUÍSSIMO ao longo do tempo, é um jogo bom, mas podia ser melhor.

6/10 Principalmente pelo preço, se conseguir em uma promoção a menos de R$10, recomendo pois vai ser um jogo pra roubar sua atenção e tomar seu tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988000877', 'num_games_owned': 1605, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1600310282}
review:
I'd sum this one up as "Meh.". At best, I'd recommend it on sale and even then I'd hesitate. It's very well made and stylized, but the moments of fun are buried under loads of boredom.

My biggest issue is that I never felt like I was "doing" much of anything. I was dodging bullets, but EVERY other decision is either automated or takes place between games (Not waves but full runs). I start my run, summon 3 or 4 heroes and start dodging so that those heroes can gain levels to deal with the threats in higher waves.

Once you gain money you can... oh wait... you can't use that now.

So, wave after wave you dodge enemy attacks and hope the AI is targeting the enemies wisely because its out of your control. Occasionally, you may decide to use your bardic powers for a passive stat boost to your party, but party level matters FAR more than skill or tactics here. Have you purchased enough upgrade units prior to this game and kept your heroes alive long enough that they are viable here? Well then there's no need for those stat boosts is there? 

Only after you die (Seems about 30 minutes per run for me) you are allowed to take your cash to buy upgrades. These range from personal stat boosts (Like a bigger party) to a town drunk that'll vomit pools of slowness to defend your town. More importantly, you can upgrade each unit here so that maybe during your next game you'll be able to win... mostly because that high level hero does everything that you can't because you're a bard that just dodges.

This is in no way a bad game. It's a well-polished game that attempted to create an exciting tower defense/bardic RPG Shooter. But in the end, I just never found myself saying "This is fun." or "This is satisfying."

author: {'steamid': '76561198015167628', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 685, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 685, 'last_played': 1598802062}

Cool idea
Cute graphics

Cons:
Can be difficult to see what units you've got out
Unit descriptions aren't very descriptive

Neutral:
Short (~10 hours of playtime)

I picked this up from a Humble Bundle I think but this game is probably worth the $8 it's currently selling for on Steam. You'll get around an hour of entertainment per dollar spent. Could use some QOL adjustments but as this game came out several years ago I don't think they'll be implemented. Ran into one bug with controller where I was unable to use my powers and was only able to summon units, which seemed to be related to alt-tabbing in the middle of a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042499490', 'num_games_owned': 2166, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1303, 'last_played': 1561819445}
review:
[h3]Shredding the Axe[/h3]

[u]It's a Hard-Rocking Rogue-Lite Barbarian[/u], that brings a good variety of fun minions into battle, facing waves of well designed enemies. A little patience is needed if you wanna get to the meaty parts. You must upgrade your buddies in-between runs. Which is great, since you get to customize your own preferred playstyle, as all these little minions have their own unique abilities.

[u]I wish they put more effort into the Music[/u]. Could have used more variety, especially for a game with the word "Bard" in the title. When you restart, and the saaame track starts again, and again, and.. Yeah, I had to resort to other sources for music at times.

[u]I'm not a completionist by any means[/u], but this was just FUN enough to keep me playing until that 100% flag was raised. Really solid timewaster!

[code]Fast-Responsive-Humorous-Polished-Barbaric-Röck'n'Röll !! [/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561197996273719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 798, 'playtime_forever': 608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1593789640}
review:
[h1] Information [/h1]

Bardbarian ist ein RPG/Shooter und TD zusammen ist, welches von TreeFortress Games entwickelt wurde. 

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

Ihr kontrolliert Brad, der keinen Bock mehr hat einfach nur Barbar zu sein und seine Axt nun als E-Gitarre verwendet. Und genau das macht er nun und inspiriert seine Dorfbewohner ihm dabei zu helfen, die bösen Eindringlinge zu bekämpfen. Das Spiel kommt ohne einen virtuellen Joystick aus und ihr könnt irgendwo auf dem Bildschirm den Finger absetzen, um Brad in die gewünschte Richtung zu bewegen. Ihr müsst nun herumlaufen und das Gold und die Noten einsammeln die von besiegten Gegner fallen gelassen werden. Um Gegner zu besiegen, heuert ihr Kämpfer an. Anfangs stehen euch nur Bogenschützen, Ninjakämpfer und Magier zur Verfügung. Je weiter ihr es in einer Runde schafft, um so bessere Einheiten werden freigeschaltet. Und obwohl es nur 21 Runden im Story-Modus gibt, so sind diese nicht unbedingt einfach. Der Shoot-em-Up Teil wird dadurch umgesetzt, dass ihr Geschossen der Gegner geschickt ausweichen müsst. In den späteren Wellen kann das schon ziemlich hektisch werden. Einen großen Teil verbringt ihr damit Gold zu sammeln um die vielen Möglichkeiten aufzuwerten. Die Kämpfer können aufgewertet werden um mehr Schaden zu verursachen, Brad darf mit mehr Lebel oder weniger Körpergeruch ausgestattet werden und Teile der Stadt können aufgewertet werden, um während der Wellen Unterstützung zu leisten. Es bleibt an euch was ihr zu erste aufwerten wollt. Empfehlen kann ich das Haustier der Stadt und Leben für Brad. Brad hat verschiedene Melodien um während des Kampfes die Kampfgemeinschaft zu unterstützen. Mehr Angriff, schneller bewegen oder ein wenig mehr Rüstung sind möglich. Alle fünf Gegner darf Brad ein Solo hinlegen welches die Gegner für ein paar Sekunden betäubt. Die Unterstützung aus der Dorfbevölkerung darf auch nicht fehlen. Ein Fischer, ein Metzger und ein Betrunkener helfen Brad bei der schwierigen Aufgabe das Dorf zu verteidigen. 

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ interessante Kombination aus mehreren Genres
+ motivierendes Upgrade System
+ gute Spielidee
+ witzige Klassen
+ experimentieren für beste Gruppen - Zusammensetzung 
+ ca. 15 Stunden Spielzeit (akzeptabel für ein RPG)
+ Errungenschaften und Trading Cards

[h1] Kontra [/h1]

- teils echt schwer

[h1] Fazit  [/h1]

Bardbarian vereint verschiedene Spielelemente zu einem grandiosen Spielerlebnis zusammen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128047458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 716, 'last_played': 1587600683}
review:
TL;DR - Not a good game if you like to achievement hunt or 100% your games. It's acceptable if you drop it when it gets tedious. Would only buy if it was on sale.

I went up and down with this one. I enjoyed the bullet hell/rogue light style gameplay. You're a bard so you don't attack, but you play music to summon party members and buff them through songs or upgrades. The game promotes multiple runs and that's where it eventually gets tedious. It got stale after a while especially since I go for that 100%. I came across one bad graphical bug and one small sound glitch. Finally, I caved and followed a detailed guide which made finishing the game less painful. I feel like this game asks way more of you than it has any right to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046450713', 'num_games_owned': 448, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1439663995}
review: Few games can successfully stray from the basic tower defense formula of a lane with some branching paths and some locations for towers. This game does an amazing job of giving you more of a moment to moment responsibility for how the level goes. Another great thing is learning effective team comps and how you should move to keep units and momentum. With a low price to begin with, its worth the buy if you enjoy tower defense games and even more worth it when on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991262582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 815, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1579749653}
review:
Really cute game that blends elements of tower defense with twin stick shooter and role-playing game. It's not particularly deep, it's mostly grinding to get more coins to buy upgrades with, but I enjoyed my time with it. The main game will take you several hours to complete, depending on how good you are. Most of the achievements you'll end up earning if you go through the whole campaign. There are also two other play modes; Survival and Escape. 

Survival is you running through an open battlefield and getting to pick up resources as you go while endless enemies keep coming at you. 

Escape is kind of interesting for a twist. You have to control your character through a constant scrolling screen and stay ahead of it while dodging obstacles and collecting coins. I liked that if you were bored with grinding in the main game you could play Escape for a bit and still collect coins that you could use in the main play mode. 

The game supports keyboard and mouse, but a controller is highly recommended.

review:
Tower defense s hrdinou. Osobně mám pro tyto hry velkou slabost. Základna má základní jednotky na obranu ale vy jakož to hrdina máte speciální schopnosti ale především svojí družinu, kterou postupně rozšiřujete a vylepšujete za účelem obránit svojí vesnici.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11196, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1576338228}
review:
Bardbarian is a mobile/tablet ported "tower defense", but instead of towers, you summon companions who do all the fighting for you.  You have to kite your companions around to fight the enemies, but you can't attack them yourself (but they can attack you).   

The irritating premise is coupled with awful cartoony tablet tier graphics and tablet/console peasant control scheme, which can't be remapped.  Graphics are also fixed, another clue that the developers only considered PC as an afterthought, doubling down on the very low quality of the game.   It's $8 on tablet but they want you to pay $11.50, another slap in the face from the developers to PC gamers.  Screw these guys.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025089345', 'num_games_owned': 2174, 'num_reviews': 2933, 'playtime_forever': 417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1564637016}
review:
一个挺好玩的防守游戏~界面很手游（其实就是手游和Flash游戏移植的）~也挺好玩的~

主角是一个拿着斧子当电吉他用的2货（你可能觉得他很帅~对我而言就是这样~）
~然后招雇佣兵攻击敌人并防守水晶~

剧情模式：主角招兵买马防守水晶，消灭怪物~一共20关
无尽模式：主角独自一人在地图上寻找小兵消灭怪物~记录时间~附带steam排行
逃亡模式：一路逃亡~被打到一下就over~记录逃跑距离~附带steam排行

联动超级食肉男和以撒~
还有很多升级物品~比如小狗会叼敌人掉落的金钱和音乐点和食物~醉鬼会呕吐导致敌人速度变慢~
但是即使这些升级统统都加了~我依旧没法通关~
~普通模式卡在第三个Boos~困难模式卡在去第四个Boss的路上~
总之~对我而言~是~一个很难的防守游戏~

author: {'steamid': '76561198012679672', 'num_games_owned': 5754, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 1379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1379, 'last_played': 1562552044}
review: Bardbarian puts a unique twist on the top down shooter, in that you can't shoot. You play as Brad the Barbarian who has become sick of fighting all the time, and decide to put some skill points into the bard class. Playing as a bard is no easy feat though, Brad has no offensive capabilities and must rely on recruiting others to do the fighting. His party will stay nearby targeting any foolish enemy that comes within range. If the town is to be saved though, Brad must keep his party alive by providing buffs and keeping them out of enemy fire.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089190959', 'num_games_owned': 1954, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 942, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 942, 'last_played': 1558525374}
review:
[h1]Bardbarian[/h1]

[b] Tower Defense tarzının bir ileri seviyesi [/b]

Öncelikle oyunu ben çok beğendim. Bunun birden fazla sebebi var. Öncelikle kendi tarzında yenilikçi olması yani tower defense türüne  'kabiliyet' eklemesi en can alıcı unsuru olmuş. Çünkü kendi türdeş oyunlarda genellikle 'sürükle ve bırak' mantığı hakimken bu oyunda ise tabiri caizse tower'ları bir nevi kontrol ediyoruz. 

Eli baltalı ana karakterimizin çağırdığı tower'lar sizinle beraber hareket edip sizi takip ediyor. Böylece dalga dalga gelen rakiplerinizin atışlarından kaçınmak durumunda kalıyorsunuz ve bu bazen çok zor olabiliyor. 

Oyunda 2 tane kaynak var. Biri altın biri de nota. Altını tower'larınızın seviyesini atlatmak, ana karakterinizin özelliklerini yükseltmek veya savaştığınız köyü geliştirmek için kullanabilirsiniz. Tower'lara seviye atlattıkça canı ve verdiği hasarı artar. Karakterinizin kendi özelliklerinde ise grubun birbirine yakın durması, müziklerin etkisini yükseltme, notanın dolma hızını yükseltme, oyuna başlarken ki nota sayısını yükseltme gibi özellikler var. Köyün özelliklerinde ise koruduğunuz binanın canını yükseltme, köy halkının size para, nota ve can yardımında bulunması, yeni çağırdığınız bir tower'ın 1 level den değil de yüksek seviyeden başlaması, rakiplerden düşen notaları ve altınları toplayan bir rakun yardımcı (pet), kusarak rakipleri yavaşlatan bir ayyaşı da para vererek açabilirsiniz. Nota ise oyun esnasında saniyeler ilerledikçe veya rakiplerden düştükçe yükselebiliyor.

Oyunda kolay ve delice olmak üzere 2 tane zorluk seviyesi var ve ayrıca birden fazla oynanabilir mod ve tower var. Önce modlardan bahsedelim. Campaing, Day 2 (Campaing devamı), Endless, Survival ve Halloween olmak üzere 5 mod var. Campaing modunda her 5 bölümde 1 boss gelmek üzere toplam 20 bölümden oluşuyor. Day2 ise campaing'in devamı özelliğinde ama pek bir güzel tarafı yok çünkü oyun artık boş hissettiriyor. Endless'da ise ana karakterimizle arkamızdan gelen siyah buluttan tam tersi istikamette kaçmaya çalışırken rakipler bizi engellemeye çalışıyor. Survival'da ise hiçbir şekilde tower çağırmaksızın sadece rastgele zamanlarda ve yine rastgele yerlerde ortaya çıkan herhangi bir tower'ı üzerine gitme halinde ele geçiriyorsunuz ve ölene dek sizle savaşıyor. Tabi saniyeler geçtikçe yeni yeni boss'lar geliyor ve dayanmanız çok zor hal alıyor. Halloween modunun tek esprisi ise rakiplerden düşen şekerlerden 100 tane toplayıp dükkana verirseniz size hayalet görünümünde bir tower hediye ediyor. 

Mod'lardan bahsettik biraz da tower'lardan bahsedelim. Oyuna başlamadan önce tower'larınızı seviye atlatabilir, ana karakterinizin özelliklerini geliştirebilir ve oyun esnasında size yardımcı olabilecek elementleri açabilirsiniz. Oyuna başlarken envanterinize 3 tane (ileriki zamanlarda 4. yuva açılacak) tower seçmenizi isteyecek. Size tavsiyem bir tane tank bir tane hasar kaynağı bir tane de destek alın. Böylece uzun dalgalar boyu dayanabilirsiniz. Oyuna başlayınca oyuna etkisi olabilecek 7 tane basabileceğiniz tuş var. Bunlardan 3'ü tower çağırma tuşları, 3'ü ana karakterin müzikleri ve 1'i de her 5 rakip öldürdüğünüzde gelen sersemletme tuşu. Sersemletme tuşu ile yakın çevrenizdeki rakipleri sersemletirsiniz, etkilidir. Müziklerden kastım ise aslında bildiğiniz 'BUFF'. Saldırı, hareket hızı ve defans olmak üzere 3 tane müzik var ve hepsi 10 nota karşılığında çalınabiliyor. Hangi müziği çaldıysanız size belli bir süre buff veriyor. Boss'lara karşı çok etkilidir, bol bol kullanın. Tabii ki tower çağırmak için de nota gerekiyor. Nota ise saniyeler ilerledikçe veya ölen rakiplerden topladıkça dolabilmekte. Tower'larınız oyun esnasında da 5. seviyeye kadar seviye alabilir  ve seviye aldıkça saldırı hızı ve kritik etkisi artarken aldığı hasar ise azalır.

 [b]Taktikler[/b]

1) Oyun başında açmanız gereken çok önemli 2 tane özellik var:
Bir tanesi köy geliştirmelerinde bulunan ve altınlar dahil düşen her şeyi toplayan rakun (pet)
Diğeri ise ana karakterin özelliklerinden olan Altın Balta. 5000 altın değerinde olan bu altın balta sayesinde topladığınız altınların değeri 2 katına çıkıyor. Bu ikisini hemen açın ve campaing mod'da deli gibi para kasmaya başlayın. Ardından grup sayısını arttırma ve başlangıç nota sayısını arttırma gibi faydalı özellikleri yükseltmeye yönelebilirsiniz.

2) Bazı towerlar çok güçlü ve bazıları da bir o kadar gereksiz. Mesela Okçu, silahlı kaplumbağa, hayalet gibi tower'lar çok çöp. Sakın onlara altın harcamayın. Abanmanız gereken tower'ları sayıyorum: Mavi büyücü, şaman, baltalı viking ve ninja. Bunları son seviyeye çekin, başınız ağrımasın.

3) Diziliminiz asla sadece 1 tower'dan oluşmasın. Size tavsiyem şudur: 2 şaman-1 viking, gerisi full mavi büyücü. Şaman rakibi yavaşlatır, kritik hasar verir ve aynı zamanda rakibin defansını kırar (ÇOK GÜÇLÜ), viking tanklar ve sersemletir, mavi büyücü ise uzaktan dürter ve rakibi geri iter. Muhteşem dizilim.

Son olarak oyun gayet güzel, fikir güzel ama çok kısa sürüyor ve mod'lar da bu durumu düzeltmiyor. Hemen bitiyor ve başından kalkıyorsunuz. Keşke campaing'in devamı  olan Day2 biraz daha ilgi çekici olsaymış da oynama süresini uzatsaymış. Siz benim 15 saat oynadığıma bakmayın, achievement yüzünden o kadar sürdü :) Düşünce güzel ama süre ve içerik bakımından eksik kalmış. Genel puanım [b]6/10[/b]  Hâlâ en sevdiğim tower defense oyunu Alien Shooter TD :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197989290281', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 315, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1561679869}
review:
https://youtu.be/0HeVr-GuhtI

A fun little mash up of tower defense and team tactics. The pixel art is spot on, challenge is about right, the grind is not too bad and the sound track is rocking.

Can be played with a controller or M&K - luckily there are rebindable controls for M&K becuase they are slightly whacky otherwise. 

Only real improvement would be a more audible icon when the crystal comes under attack.  

If your after a fun little time waster with some fun memes you could certainly do worse

author: {'steamid': '76561198003164240', 'num_games_owned': 551, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 853, 'last_played': 1414342323}
review:
Bardbarian handelt von einem kräftigen Kerl, der es mit seiner Axt-Laute ordentlich rocken lässt. Das Gameplay würde ich als actionreiche Tower-Defense beschreiben. So habt ihr nämlich stets die Kontrolle über den Bardbarian, allerdings kann dieser nicht selber angreifen, womit wir beim eigentlichen Clou des Spiels wären.

In jedem Level geht es darum den Stadtkristall vor den anstürmenden Gegnern zu beschützen. Dazu ruft ihr Begleiter herbei, die wiederum Noten kosten. Bei euren Gefährten handelt es sich etwa um Bogenschützen, Magier oder auch Handwerker. Jede Einheit hat spezielle Fähigkeiten, so baut der Handwerker etwa Geschützturme auf, falls gerade keine Monster in der Nähe sind und auf die nächste Welle gewartet wird. Hier gibt es viel Abwechslung und es macht Spaß alle Charaktere auszuprobieren. 

Pro erledigtem Gegner sammelt ihr Gold und könnt damit die Einheiten oder unterstützenden Fähigkeiten des Bardbarians verbessern. Weiterhin könnt ihr auch die Stadt verbessern, so findet ihr dann Händler auf dem Spielfeld, die euch regelmäßig mit Nahrung versorgen, welche eure Gruppe etwas heilt. Es gibt sehr viel Freischaltbares und neben der Kampagne gibt es auch einen Endlos- bzw. Überlebensmodus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043495274', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 339, 'playtime_forever': 1984, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1420, 'last_played': 1678556808}
review:
Un EXCELLENT tower defence au concept original et dynamique !

Vous devez protéger votre crystal qui subit les assauts de monstres divers et variés (sacré bestiaire qui passe du petit gobelin lent au tir unique, au tyranoeil aux tirs multiples, ou encore à la brutasse qui vous charge pour finir par une espèce de fusée qui traverse la map etc…) 

Pour se faire vous êtes aidés par des recrues qu’il faudra invoquer à coup de notes de musiques. Ces dernières se rechargent avec le temps ou plus rapidement lorsque vous vous immobilisez. Là encore vous avez un sacré choix de compagnons donc de synergies d’équipe à étudier. (archers, healers, tank qui vous entourent et qui se déplacent avec vous).

Les ennemis sortent de trois grottes : « haut » « milieu » « bas », à vous de jongler et de vous en référer à votre mini map pour n’oublier personne. Vous allez vous balader sur la carte tout en évitant les tirs qui viennent de partout et pourrez utiliser 4 compétences (encore avec votre instrument) pour : aller plus vite, assommer vos assaillants, faire plus de dégâts ou un bouclier pour mieux vous protéger. 

Le village que vous parcourez est jonché de boutiques qui vous aideront dans votre quête. Soin, notes de musiques, bourse d’or, ivrogne (qui ralentit les ennemis en répandant une flaque de vomi, hmmm sympa) etc…

Tout ce petit monde devra être boosté si vous voulez venir à bout du cycle et affronter le boss. L’or amassé permet donc d’acheter des améliorations et là encore vous en avez pour un moment. 

Quelques petits jeux annexes rajoutent un peu de contenu et proposent des mini jeux fun. 

On en fait relativement vite le tour mais si vous voulez creuser, optimiser, tester des compos d’équipe ou encore atteindre le 100% vous en aurez pour votre argent. 

Le concept est sympa, et même si on peut déplorer l’absence de trame scénaristique ce jeu a beaucoup de choses à offrir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198190380543', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 603, 'playtime_forever': 481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1549527642}
review: Bardbarian is a pretty cool game where you basically move around with a squad of your choosing to attack enemies that are trying to destroy your village crystal. What’s neat about it is the progression system. The main game consists of 20 enemy waves, but to beat them all you’ll progress a bit at a time, by dying, upgrading with gold, progressing a little further, dying again and so forth. You’ll really feel the progression in the game. There’s a total of 16 different units to choose, and a decent amount of enemy variety, including bosses. There’s also a lot to choose from the upgrade store. Although most of the time you’re just running around getting close to enemies and evading their attacks, I enjoyed it. There’s also an insane difficulty mode that although harder, is way less grindier since you get gold faster. This means that the early game is actually easier, but later on gets more difficult, since you die faster. After the 20 main waves, there’s also an endless mode, just throwing harder and harder waves to see how far you can get. It’s the endgame. And there’s also a survival mode, where you try to evade attacks for as long as you can, and a runner mode, similar to the endless runner genre, where you try to get as far as you can while evading attacks. The art style is neat and the soundtrack cool, but gets repetitive fast. Still, for cheap, is a neat game that I enjoyed and can easily recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128629280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 732, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 558, 'last_played': 1499713776}

author: {'steamid': '76561198008049239', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 406, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1684125708}
review:
On se situe entre le tower defense et le shoot em up ce qui en fait un genre batard ou hybride pour être moins péjoratif.
Personnellement je ne sais pas si c'est que je n'aime simplement pas ça ou si c'est que le jeu n'a pas les bons éléments pour être bien à mes yeux mais en tout cas je n'adhère pas.

On passe notre temps à esquiver les attaques en espérant que le team est un créneau suffisant en terme d'espace et de temps pour tuer les assaillants.
Les améliorations d'unités et de villes sont une bonne idée mais leur achat nécessitant de l'or que l'on obtient en affrontant vagues après vagues jusqu'à notre mort, on se retrouve à farmer encore et toujours.

Côtés graphismes et sons, franchement c'est bien foutu. La traduction française est approximative mais c'est pas gênant vu l'absence totale d'histoire.

Bref, y'a de bons éléments de gameplay provenant aussi bien du shoot em up que du tower defense mais sur moi ça ne prends pas du tout. Cela dit, objectivement parlant, le jeu est sympa et peut être un bon défouloir quand on a quelques minutes à perdre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043815251', 'num_games_owned': 2014, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 753, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1544471200}
review:
Juego más orienta a un movil que a otra cosa.
Manjeas a un Bardo, con el que tendras que "invocar" a ciertas unidades, y estas posicionaran a tu al rededor, y atacaran por ti.

El ritmo de las oleadas se hace muy lento,  (al menos en los primeros 2-3 bosses), y no hya ningun boton para acelerarlo.

Desbloquearas unidades cumpliendo ciettos requisitos, y podras mejorar tanto a estas unidades, como al propio bardo.
Textos del juego traducidos a base de google.
Te mantiene enganchado si te gusta ir mejorando cosas, pero se hace muy pesado, pues la jugabilidad es muy simple. y te limitaras a ir esquivando proyectiles enemigos, miestras tus "aliados"  intentan cargarse a los enemigos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060936212', 'num_games_owned': 367, 'num_reviews': 338, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1544030436}
review:
6/10

Милая вариация на тему tower defense, высказывающая несколько новых (по крайней мере для меня) идей в жанре, но в конечном счете слишком короткая и, на мой вкус, однообразная. Отчасти поэтому я так и не прошел финального босса после нескольких неудачных попыток его завалить. Мог бы со временем - но зачем?

Удивительное.
Характерные признаки любого tower defense сражения - некий кристалл, который нужно защищать, и волны врагов, старающиеся его разрушить, - налицо, но вот с самими "башнями" получилось веселее. Все они собраны в одну кучу, которая носится по всему полю сражения между кристаллом и точками порождения монстров. В роли башен выступают разношерстные фентезийные воины, который ведет наш герой - варвар-бард. Получается такое веселое "гуляй-поле", будто защищать деревню от полчищ врагов поставили Нестера Махно. Даже такой боевой прием, как тачанка, на месте - подлетаем к врагу, разворачиваемся и удаляемся, пока стрелковый хвост отряда радостно по нему палит. В первую очередь этим игра и хороша - этакой залихватскостью происходящего.

Плюсы.
- Рисовка - все-таки для меня самые удачные tower defense проекты почему-то именно в мультяшно-фентезийном ключе.
- Здоровый юмор и позитив всей истории, взять хотя бы тот факт, что вся игра происходит в течение одного (уверен - типичного) дня нашего героя - четыре босса, как всадники апокалипсиса - утро, день, вечер, ночь.

Минусы.
- Дополнительные режимы скучноваты, пробежка годится только для быстрого заработка денег (особенно вначале), а выживание я открывал только для ачивок.
- Честно говоря, музыка так себе - слишком пресная, забываешь моментально, и ни на что она не вдохновляет - бард из варвара получился на любителя.
- Наверное, неправильно, когда в игре полтора десятка юнитов-"башен", открывающихся на разных уровнях, но почти все они нужны, чтобы доползти до последнего типа, с которым игра и проходится наконец - никаких комбинаций, чистый урон.
- Выставить в качестве улучшения деревни помощника-алкаша, в чьих лужах рвоты монстры замедляются, - не вдохновляющая идея.

Если нужна недолгая игра позалипать, когда на более обстоятельные игры времени нет, берите. Наверное, со скидкой.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172925593', 'num_games_owned': 14020, 'num_reviews': 4532, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1538664892}
review:
一款挺有创意，融合了ACT+TD玩法的休闲小游戏
普通防御模式下，敌人从地图的右面出现，向你左侧的主基地进攻，你需要在他们打爆你的基地前杀光他们，这点同一般防御类游戏没有太多的区别
但本作主角是一个虽然拿了把斧头（不过是当做吉他用），但却完全不会攻击从而造成伤害的音乐人（伪）
你必须依靠招募的雇佣兵去攻击敌人，而你只能带领着你的手下一起躲避敌人的子弹，当然你的雇佣兵也会一直保持在你周围
所以这也造成了一个难点，因为你没有办法直接控制雇佣兵，因此他们的躲避动作并没有办法完全做到和你一致，所以很容易因为慢一步、或者距离远了点受到敌人的伤害
招募雇佣兵需要花费的音乐点数，通过主角的自动回复或者拾取击杀怪物的掉落物而增加，有上限
这些点数除了招募雇佣兵外还能释放3个技能，分别是增加攻击力、移动速度、防御力
另外主角还有唯一一个可以主动释放的技能，作用是震晕+击退附近的所有敌人
中后期依靠震晕+加攻技能+集火可以造成非常可观的伤害
正常防御模式下，共有20关，每5关一个BOSS，如果战胜BOSS，可以选择从这个节点开始下一次的游戏（当然也可以每次都从第一关开始）
游戏里击杀怪物会有掉落金币，拾取的金币在关卡失败后或者每次开始新的挑战前可以用来升级
升级有3个方向，一个是雇佣兵等级（提高伤害、生命值）、一个是主角属性（生命值、移动速度、音乐点恢复速度等多个属性）、还有一个是主基地的特殊功能（比如召唤一只可以帮你拾取金币的宠物、帮你减速的酒鬼、雇佣兵招募上限等），基本上可以说，这游戏只要肯花时间farm，把普通防御模式通关还是没啥问题的

但除了普通防御模式外，游戏还有3个其他高阶模式
生存模式
在一张大地图上，不停刷新怪物，你只能找寻同样在地图上间隔刷新的雇佣兵，靠近兵种招募他们帮助你攻击怪物
这个模式下击杀怪物不是关键、需要努力生存下去，存活越久排名越高
当然完全逃跑也是不行的，因地图上的怪物会不停刷新，如果一直积累着的话很有可能导致你根本就没有空间躲避敌人的子弹

逃离模式
同样不是杀怪为主的玩法，类似于跑酷类游戏，你的后面会有死亡迷雾追赶着你，你需要躲避着路上的各种陷阱、敌人攻击而不停往前逃跑
逃跑距离越远、排名越高

在普通防御模式通关后，可以解锁day 2模式
所有雇佣兵等级上限+1、开始游戏的雇佣兵侯选池上限+1（可以携带4个雇佣兵类型，用来主动招募）
玩法上和普通防御模式一样，但难度变更高，敌人数量更多，BOSS关也会出现多个BOSS
而且貌似这个模式下的关卡数量是可以不停往上涨的，只要有能力就能一直挑战下去的无尽关卡

author: {'steamid': '76561198029242857', 'num_games_owned': 747, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 564, 'last_played': 1536957046}
review:
You really can't go wrong with this game, and it's cheap oh and fun, a lot of fun (for those who like a fair challenge) to be more precise! It offers a nifty tower defense game in a midieval setting where you need to ward off countless waves of undead while improving your main hero, units and base (on a grinding we will go, yo ho..) and it's pretty fun regardless of getting hard(er) depending on how far you go.. Good thing is, everything you get to unlock will be yours to keep and explore forever (now how great is that)! 
The soundtrack is rock/metal oriented so for those who like house/techno etc will not be met with such pounding beats and flashy laser spectacles.. (huhuhuh sobs*..)
If you want to know more, you'll just have to buy this game and play it.. (you can even get it cheaper online, like i did but don't tell anyone else about it alright... Check it out: allkeyshop . com (<for availability and best prices)

author: {'steamid': '76561198307502258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1534896507}
review:
Firstly: this is essentially a tower defence game; you cannot directly attack, but are reliant solely on your summoned troops (referred to as your 'party').  The main difference is that, unlike most tower defence games, you are mobile and take the fight to the invaders.

Easy to pick up and with a vibrant, cartoony feel, this will have you coming back for more and you'll quickly find your party able to progress further and further into the campaign.

Once you finish the main story there are plenty of things to keep you busy: a survival mode, an 'escape' mode (basically an endless runner) and most challenging of all, Day 2.  That's right, once the main story is finished there is a much more challenging follow-up!

If you're looking for some quick-blast gaming that'll have you thinking 'just one more go', this is one of the best choices I've found, and is well worth a look.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061518470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1264, 'last_played': 1534080880}
review:
Необычная трактовка жанра Tower defense, где вместо башен юниты, бегающие вокруг главного героя, музыка попадающая в динамику игры и довольно приятный визуальный стиль выделяют  [i]Bardbarian[/i] среди других игр жанра. Однако, сама игра очень маленькая и затянуть надолго в ней может разве, что стремление попасть на вершину таблицы рекордов. 

Всего одна музыкальная композиция сопровождает нас на протяжении всей игры. Все действия происходят на одной локации и боссов всего четыре. Негусто, но видно, что игру делали с любовью к мелочам и энтузиазмом. Даже то,что игра короткая в каком то смысле плюс. Геймплей игр в жанре Tower defense никогда не блистал разнообразием и [i]Bardbarian[/i] не исключение, в этом плане. Он кончается не успев надоесть и оставляет приятные воспоминания.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131964276', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1533050104}
review:
I got Bardbarian for free and saw that it has a Very Positive rating over hundreds and hundreds of reviews. So I decided to play it instead of just farming its cards. 

I played a lot of Tower Defense, RTS and RPG games before and I can say that even for the less than 10 hours Bardbarian has to offer, it did a good job of taking bits from each genre and melding them to become something almost entirely different and its own.

What I liked about the gameplay is it being continuous. You progress on each level seamlessly and only stop when you die, pause the game or quit entirely. No loading screens, cutscenes, or any of the like. The margin for mistakes is also relatively thin compared to other games today. Get hit once or twice without using the Song of Defense on later levels will  get you killed. Moving and using your skills feels good and is fluid.

The graphics/artsyle kinda reminds me of Castle Crashers and other indie games.

The music used is enjoyable at first, but you might wanna play your own music later on.

For the story, there's not much to say about Bardbarian. One thing's for sure, you shouldn't be buying this game for that.

Go get this on sale (game's too short for its full price, less than 5 hours if you do everything right from the start) and for the gameplay. I give this game 6.5 VERY NICEs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282521790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1530461642}
review:
It's not that bad, but there are many defense games much more worthy, especially in this price range (and I got it on sale too). I got bored with it after beating it and advancing to day two. It's not easy though, played on max difficulty as it was recommended even by the developers.

This is an interesting type of defense game though.

Purchased it out of curiosity, but kind of regret it. Just not worth it at this price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057264053', 'num_games_owned': 2286, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 829, 'last_played': 1557298328}
review:
Imagine um tower defense onde a torre se move pelo campo até os inimigos? Então, esse é o Bardbarian.
No game, você é um bárbaro que cansou da vida de matança e se tornou um bardo à moda CHIMBINHA, destinado a tocar seu techno-samba-funk-pop e espalhar o amor e a paz pelo mundo. 

Porém o vilarejo começa a ser atacado, e como você jurou não mais matar, você terá que ajudar da forma que você pode: TOCANDO O BOM E VELHO SOM! 

Recrute mercenários de todos os tipos e entoe canticos para aumentar seus ataques, defesas e velocidade enquanto lutam contra essas criaturas. Faça upgrades, desbloqueie novos mercenários, tudo isso ao bom e velho som: ANITA, CALYPSO, LATINO, etc.

Recomendado para amantes de boa música!

author: {'steamid': '76561198074229833', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1530909249}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971544967', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1529735502}
review:
I mild recommendation for me.  The game is fun in short bursts but gets a bit repetative eventually.  But I think it was designed to be a game you play for 5-10 hours and then put aside so that is ok.

The gameplay is straightforward.  You are an Barbarian who is lazy today and so converts his axe into a guitar and becomes a bard.  Your town is being attacked and you must defend the town center.  You do this by recruiting a party (limited to 3 or 4 types) which all have different abilities such as damage, range, stun, attack pattern, etc.  Your character can also play some songs which boosts attack, defense or speed and you have one special song that stuns everything in an area but is more limited in how often you can use it.  You defend until you die and you spend your gold to improve your units, the town or yourself.  The game tags include tower-defense but you don't build any towers so I think that classification is a bit misleading.

Fun, but the game could have been better with more levels, enemy types, better campaign, etc.  Really only worth it on sale and if all you are looking for is something to have a little fun with in 15-30 min sessions.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150324167', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1637760910}

author: {'steamid': '76561197967223692', 'num_games_owned': 913, 'num_reviews': 223, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1529523246}
review:
Bardbarian is a game that makes me wish there was a mixed rating option, rather than just positive or negative options for the review. Overall it is a decent game, but not what I was looking for. Also, the tags are wrong. This is not a tower defense game, this is a bullet hell game where you rely on NPCs to do the shooting for you. It is ok, the sort of thing you boot up and play when you have nothing better to do, or are inbetween better games.

What soured this game for me is the grind. There are four main levels (morning, afternoon, evening, and night), each broken up into four or five smaller parts. As they progress they get harder and harder, each ending with a boss fight. The amount of customization, upgrades, and NPC helpers you have access to is great, but you will need to play the game over and over to upgrade and unlock them. When I say over and over again, I really mean it. This is enjoyable gameplay for some people, but it was boring for me. If you are interested in this game, I would suggest waiting and getting it while it is on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081457364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1528975956}

author: {'steamid': '76561198262533608', 'num_games_owned': 277, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 899, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 742, 'last_played': 1529025426}
review:
打折的时候，-41%，18软妹币，然后心动了。在某宝搜了下，6块钱，果断选择某宝并入手(＾Ｕ＾)ノ~ＹＯ
很有趣，很新颖吧，本身很喜欢塔防类的游戏的，这种移动类塔防，让我想起了兽人必须死。
个人认为，最后那个兵种才是爸爸，其它基本过度，没怎么用（主要前期没太多钱升级兵种），不懂得搭配，都是单一兵种通关的。
第二天的关卡，就用那个闪电飞镖单兵9个的，有一次打了22+W，还是因为怪太多，基地爆了，说明还是足够牛逼的，也没心思再弄其他阵容搭配了。
虽然没有中文（没有去看有没有补丁），反正英文还算比较简单的，玩开英文游戏的基本都能懂，就不吐槽这个中文了。
最后，我觉得，如果你喜欢塔防，这个游戏值得一试，反正才6块，6块你买不了吃亏，买不来上当，哈哈！

author: {'steamid': '76561198114137430', 'num_games_owned': 414, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 559, 'last_played': 1404612055}

author: {'steamid': '76561198069402855', 'num_games_owned': 1109, 'num_reviews': 221, 'playtime_forever': 1151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1151, 'last_played': 1527867623}
review:
For a game where some 60% of the controls, aiming and shooting, are automatic it is surprisingly fun and difficult. Bardbarian is a fun and simple game. Play as a literal Bard Barbarian and summon warriors with your awesome ax guitar and than run around like a mad man trying not to die. 

There's no denying that it gets a bit grindy towards the mid-part of the game, but you tend not to notice it to much as each milestone is marked the the unlocking of a new unit giving you more advanced and complex methods to fight. Units are all colorful, well animated, and unique in their appearance and abilities so it's always fun to get into the fight again just to see what the new guy does. 

Sadly, the game is rather short and once you finish it the first time there really isn't much else to do than just replaying it over and over to level and unlocking all your abilities and units. By this point you can just about stand still, only having to move for boss fights, and the game plays itself. Even admit I ended up falling asleep several times on the game by this point. There are a few extra modes to spice things up, but they won't really keep you entertained and unless you're one of those people who just like to see their name on a leader-board, there really is no point to playing again once its done.

Still for its price the game offers a good amount of fun for your buck. Worth a pick up, especially if it's on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977111607', 'num_games_owned': 2731, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1527556500}
review:
[h1][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/32651167/]Página de Curadoria [/url][/h1]

[h1] Bardbarian [/h1]

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]GERAL[/th]

    [/tr]

        [td]HISTÓRIA[/td]

    [/tr]

    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]GRÁFICOS[/td]
        [td]7.5[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]CONTEÚDO[/td]
        [td]7.0[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]LINGUAGEM[/td]
        [td]INGLÊS[/td]
    [/tr]

[/table]

[b] Introdução [/b]
Bardbarian é um jogo de defender sua base com alguns elementos de RPG e de tower defense (apesar de não ter torres). Possui uma ótima trilha sonora e é bem divertido de jogar! Além disso possui minigames interessantes e o dinheiro obtido neles pode ser usado na campanha principal.

[b] História [/b]

Você controla Brad, o bárbaro. É irônico que você acorda e sua cidade está sendo sitiada mas seu personagem está cansado de lutar e do grind de experiência (mas é basicamente o que o jogo é, um grind de ouro e experiência). Mas, então, em vez de ir lutar, Brad faz um alaúde com um velho machado e vai defender a cidade usando ele.

[b] Jogabilidade [/b]

O jogo funciona como se fosse um tower defense em que as torres são humanos que ficam em volta do seu personagem principal. E você tem que se movimentar pelo mapa fugindo de projéteis enquanto essas torres atacam os inimigos. Ao matar inimigos você vai coletando ouro que é usado para dar upgrade no brad, na cidade e nos outros personagens. É um twist interessante no gênero de Tower Defense, apesar de eu relutar um pouco de concordar em chamar esse jogo de tower defense.
Apesar disso é bem divertido e o grind não é tão cansativo. Os chefes tem dinâmicas diferentes e são apenas 20 estágios.

[b] Gráficos [/b]

O jogo tem gráficos bacanas mas bem simples. Vários personagens e até alguns de outros jogos indies mais conhecidos. Bem feito para a proposta do game mas nada extraordinário.

[b] Conteúdo [/b]

É um jogo curto! É possível terminá-lo em cerca de 3 horas, mas depende de como você juntar dinheiro isso pode se alongar pra até quase 10 horas. Os mais assíduos que querem ter 100% em tudo podem até chegar a ficar com 20 horas de jogo, mas dá pra pegar tudo com menos tempo também.

[b] Conclusão [/b]

Bardbarian vale a pena de se jogar se você achar ele numa promoção. Eu consegui ele num Bundle em 2014 e acabou sendo muito barato. Para quem gosta de jogos no estilo defenda seu castelo vale bastante a pena. E a trilha sonora é muito legal!

author: {'steamid': '76561198035606911', 'num_games_owned': 741, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1526830713}

author: {'steamid': '76561197990034593', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 704, 'last_played': 1526657060}
review:
Ninjas ! Zombies ! Ninjas ! Fini à 100 % !

Bardbarian, un jeu créé et développé par " TreeFortress Games " le 1er avril 2014.

Ce jeu est une sorte de RPG Tour Defense en 2D. 
Il n'a pas d'histoire a proprement dit donc pas de but particulier.
En gros résumé, vous contrôlerez plusieurs personnages à la fois afin de défendre votre cristal des vagues d'ennemis arrivant devant vous.

Bien, ayant la flemme de développer davantage, passons tout de suite aux +++ et au --- !


Les +++ : 

1 / La diversification : Plusieurs personnages déblocables dans le jeu, plusieurs levels de personnages également à acheter, plusieurs modes de jeu (survie, course, insane mode adventure, ...), ... Le jeu est vite prenant car la répétition est sans cesse remodelé pour ne pas se lasser.
Un jeu court et bien pensé !

2 / Le gameplay : Achat de pet pour ramasser l'or, achat d'amélioration (vitesse plus rapide, plus de vie, de défense, ...) ce tower defense reprend les bases du tower defense et se veut complet quand au gameplay utilisable dans ce style de jeu. 
De plus, ayant une vingtaine de classes environ, les possibilités de combos et gameplays avec votre équipe choisie sont monstrueux !

3 / Les succès : des très faciles au plus durs, certains succès vous donneront du fil à retordre et rendront ce jeu plus agréable à terminer.


Les --- :

1 / Le coût des améliorations : Assez cher ! 
C'est la raison qui vous fera jouer 10 heures au lieu de 2 (si vous farmez les succès) car acheter toutes les améliorations du jeu va vous demander de farm encore et encore le mode aventure !


Voilà, au final, ce jeu est un superbe passe temps ! A n'en pas douter !
Ceux qui aiment les jeux de tower defense, n'hésitez pas ! ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198004625267', 'num_games_owned': 3306, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 647, 'last_played': 1525569026}
review:
Verdict: Recommended - A tower defense combined with shoot 'em up

+
Steam achievements
Steam trading cards
Download is 96 Mb
Funny tutorial 
4 game modes - Campaign (Normal / Insane), Endless, Survival Arena, Runner
16 heroes (serve as turrets) - all of them act quite differently and suit different roles
Progression elements - Upgrades for heroes, main character and town
Actually requires some form of strategy (until you get the storm knight, then just spam those)
4 different bosses
About 10 different enemies (all of them act in an unique way)
Leaderboard
Quite nice metal-ish soundtrack
Charming hand-drawn graphics
Halloween mode (costumes for several enemy characters and main hero)
Tons of refferences to other games
actually requires some strategical thinking (resource management)
Steam cloud
Works perfectly well with controlel, mouse and keyboard (mouse and keyboard can be combined but don't have to)
No bugs and the game never crashed for me 
About 10 hours to 100%

-
About 2,5 hours worth of campaign
Lacking option menu 
Insane requires the game to be completed on Normal
Endless requires the game to be completed on Insane (artifical progression)
100% achievement is a grindfest
The whole game can be done by 3 full hero combinations (Archers -> Shinobi -> Storm Knights)
No voice acting
Basically no story

author: {'steamid': '76561198148202201', 'num_games_owned': 849, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1525336901}

author: {'steamid': '76561197995737236', 'num_games_owned': 1690, 'num_reviews': 231, 'playtime_forever': 835, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 644, 'last_played': 1652625778}
review: Bardbarian est un jeu de type tower defense très sympathique et drôle dans lequel vous devez protéger votre cristal contre des hordes de monstres. Le jeu demande du challenge car il faut créer son équipe de recrues en cherchant les bonnes synergies parmi de nombreuses recrues disponibles. Il y a de plus de nombreuses améliorations à acheter. Une fois le mode normal fini, le jeu peut se rejouer en mode insane pour ceux qui aiment les défis. Tout cela est dispo à petit prix.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964248449', 'num_games_owned': 855, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1524676764}
review:
Joskus vuonna käpy ja keppi, kun vielä omistin älypuhelimen, minulla oli tämä peli siinä. Muistoihini peli oli jättänyt positiivisen vaikutelman ja ainoaksi miinukseksi muistelin sen, että hahmoa ohjastava sormi tuppasi tulemaan aina välillä tielle, mikä aiheutti ymmärrettävistä syistä pieniä käytännön ongelmia.

Pikakelaus vuoteen 2018, jolloin jostain kumman syystä omistan tämän pelin tietokoneella. Ilokseni huomasin, että pelihän oli tosiaan ihan hauska ja nyt ei ainakaan ole sitä ongelmaa, että sormi tulisi tielle pelatessa. Varsinkin kun näkymää saa vielä muokattua viemällä kameran kauemmaksi siitä, missä se pelin alussa on.

Pelissä ohjataan Brad nimistä bardbaaria (tai no musisoivaa barbaaria, mutta mennään tolla otsakkeen sanaleikillä), jonka tehtävänä on suojella kaupunkia örkkien hyökkäykseltä. Brad ei itse tee mitään damagea vihollisiin, joten mukaan pitää palkata kolmen hengen ryhmä apureita (myöhemmin saa toki isommankin joukon mukaan). Bradin tehtäväksi jää näin ollen vain tilutella luuttukirvestä ja kerätä nuottivoimia, joilla sitten ostetaan lyhytaikaisia statbuffeja tai uusia hahmoja kuolleiden tilalle. Peli toimii tower defense -periaatteella, eli örkkejä ei saa päästää oikean reunan metsästä tuhoamaan vasemman reunan Town Crystalia. Siinä välissä on sitten taistelutantere, jossa saa vapaasti juoksennella tuon porukkansa kanssa tiiviissä nipussa väistellen vihujen luoteja ja koittaen samalla saada omien joukkojen automaattiset iskut osumaan vastustajiin.

Pelissä on pari erilaista tilaa, jota tahkota. Näitä ovat:

-kampanjamoodi (neljä episodia)
-survival mode (pysytellään hengissä mahd. kauan)
-longest run (tai joku tän niminen, missä vaan juostaan ruutua eteenpäin vihuja väistellen)

Kampanjamoodi on hauskin ja oikeastaan ainoa, mitä jaksaa tahkota achievementien ulkopuolelta. Se on sopivan haastava, joten ihan heittämällä ei tätä pääsekään läpi, mikä oli ihan kiva yllätys. Grindaaminen ei kuitenkaan mene sairaalloiseksi, varsinkin jos osaa ostaa oikeat päivitykset sankarille/kaupunkiin/joukoille. Puuduttamaan peli pääsee kuitenkin aina aika ajoin, sillä kampanjamoodi kannattaa aloittaa aina alusta asti, koska bossit tiputtelee aika penteleesti rahaa. Jatkomahdollisuushan olisi myös aina siitä viimeisimmästä episodistakin, mutta jos sillä tavalla hinkuttelee menemään niin peliaika vähintään tuplaantuu. Siinä vaiheessa aivan varmasti alkaisi jo tulemaan grindaaminen korvista. Semmosen vinkin voin antaa, että kannattaa laajentaa joukkojen kokoa heti niiden rahapäivitysten jälkeen.

Noita päivityspaketteja on myös vaikka muille jakaa. Erilaisia hahmoja on ihan penteleesti ja jokaiselle niistä on tarjolla joku viisi päivitysastetta. Tämän lisäksi sankarilla on kourallinen taitoja ja ominaisuuksia, joita voi päivitellä. Puhumattakaan kaupungin päivityksistä, joita on myös mukava liuta. Eli ainakin on mistä valita ja jokainen voi muodostaa oman taktiikkansa. Ehkä silti sanoisin, että muutamat skillit/hahmot ovat ihan turhia ja toiset taas aika ylivoimaisia, joten helposti ajautuu aina samaan taktiikkaan ja sekös jos mikä on tylsää.

Noin muuten peli toimii todella sujuvasti ja on ihan viihdyttävän näköinen. Ei tästä seuraa saa pitkäksi aikaa, mutta pienenä välipalana isompien proggisten välissä ihan toimiva kokonaisuus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054048456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 1502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1271, 'last_played': 1553266965}
review:
Never saw a game like this before. Lets call it the most creative dodging simulator possible.
The core gameplay consists of trying to make your hero + your minions live through a storm of projectiles and mobs to ensure victory while also killing them fast enough to prevent your core from dieing.
You can decide the way you wanna try to win your wave by choosing from a palette of minions differing in Range, AOE/Singletarget and being less or more tanky.

For sure worth a recommendation
Time required: Around 10-15 hours

author: {'steamid': '76561197991252042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1519135463}
review:
買ってずっと積みゲーだったTD。というか、TDと知らなかった。
PLATFORMゲー的に走り回って、呼び出した仲間が勝手に敵を倒すものと思ってた。

TDと知ってプレーしてみたが、ありかな、とは思うが、マウスに負担がかかるのでいまいちオススメできない。
TDなので、呼び出す仲間、主人公、タワーなどパワーアップできる。
SANCTUMのように、主人公は攻撃できない。仲間が自動で攻撃する。
またヒーラーもいるが、ヒーラーは自分の生命と交換で仲間を癒すので使いどころに工夫が必要。
また仲間の種類も縛りが掛かるので、それなりにストラテジーは必要と思う。

ただ、ゲームとしてはやはり、こういうのもありだろう。

review: It was ok. Reminds me of Plants vs Zombies. Probably because the asthetics and the lane-base tower defense style. It's a bit different tho then PvZ. Also it's quite grindy. You'll need to put hours to farm gold to be able to get better upgrades instead of relying on skills alone. Alas, the game is not enticing enough for me to play till the endgame. Too bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990329200', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 546, 'last_played': 1517392412}
review:
Nettes Spiel für Zwischendurch. Geringer Umfang und ohne Tiefe. Ich würde einen Daumen zur Seite vergeben.

Positiv:

+ Interessante Kombination aus Tower-Defense und Side-Scrolling.
+ Coole Spielidee (als reiner Supporter) lustig umgesetzt (in Form von Gitarrenriffs)
+ Kurzweiliges Gameplay.
+ Motivierendes Upgrade-System.
+ Die Suche nach der effektivsten Gruppenzusammenstellung erfordert einiges an Ausprobieren.

Negativ:

- Von Anfang an muss gegrindet werden um voran zu kommen.
- Gameplay super simpel, kann schnell nerven.
- Einige Texte nicht übersetzt. Beschreibungen teils auf Deutsch, teils auf Englisch.
- Geringer Umfang (in unter 10 Stunden hat man alles gesehen).

author: {'steamid': '76561198115561877', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 517, 'last_played': 1515445633}
review:
Jogo estilo tower defense só que com uma mecânica diferente de todo jogo de tower defense que ja joguei.
É um Bárbaro Bardo que usa de sua musica para recrutar tropas para lutarem ao seu lado e defenderem o cristal da base.
Não é como aqueles jogos de tower defense onde voce cria estruturas e as hordas de inimigos vem com o tempo, nele, voce recruta tropas e sai andando ao meio da orda de inimigos que vem com o tempo, suas tropas lhe acompanham e ajudam a derrotar os inimigos.
Muitas referencias à jogos famosos como: Super Meat Boy, The Binding of Isaac, Octodad.
Jogo bem rapido e que exige um pouco de reflexo para desviar dos projéteis inimigos.
Upgrades tem um limite, não stacka por porcentagem até voce matar inimigos em 1 hit como alguns jogos de tower defense.
Possibilidades de criar varias combinaçoes diferentes de tropas, um time mais defensivo, um time mais agressivo, usar curandeiras ou necromantes.

Jogo Show de Bola

Recomendo muito

author: {'steamid': '76561198176126666', 'num_games_owned': 524, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1511896054}
review:
Все вроде бы неплохо и прикольно, но из-за досадного бага не могу поставить положительный отзыв: покупаешь улучшение на расширение отряда до 4х, а перед битвой все равно больше 3х взять не могу...
Ну и, конечно, бесконечный гринд на репите: вместо того. чтобы сделать больше уровней и разнообразных волн, разработчики просто задрали сложность до потолка, заставляя проходить одни и те же уровни/волны десятки раз для прокачки, чтобы после 10й попытки продвинуться на один уровень вперед и потом начать сначала. Лень разработчиков в чистом виде.

I still argue with my co-worker about which is the best team to use.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044341631', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1510787002}
review: Do you like running back and forth, occasionally pressing one or two buttons while npcs actually fight the enemy? Well, you still probably won't like this game. Your followers will constantly die due to the fact that they are too far away from you and get hit by enemy projectiles. Also, the only way to heal them is to recruit clerics, lowering your available damage. Oh, and the clerics can't heal themselves so you need two, lowering your damage even more. Frustrating and poorly thought out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081363166', 'num_games_owned': 1268, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1589397836}
review:
[h1]Музыка, в которой звучит глас Рока.[/h1]

[i]Давненько я не играла в столь потрясные, динамичные и веселые игры! Как минимум, со времен [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/alina_nomie/recommended/518730]Zombo Buster Rising.[/url]
Данная игра является, пожалуй, одной из самых интересных, увлекательных и необычных представительниц жанра [b]Tower Defense.[/b] Оригинальности ей добавляют различные возможности и элементы, взятые прямиком из ролевых игр - управление отдельным персонажем, а также свободное передвижение по игровому пространству. Что очень роднит ее с [b]X Hero Siege[/b] (картой для [b]WarCraft III[/b]), а также с игровыми сериями [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/65800/Dungeon_Defenders]Dungeon Defenders[/url] и [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/102600/Orcs_Must_Die]Orcs Must Die![/url]
В игре присутствует два [b]уровня сложности[/b] - нормальный и сумасшедший, три [b]режима игры[/b] - аркадный, побег и выживание, а также особый [b]мод[/b] - Хэллоуин, который привносит в игру возможность гриндить конфеты и нового хэллоуинского юнита.
Вообще, гринд и фарм являются если не основным, то уж точно ключевым фактором в [b]Bardbarian[/b]. Зарабатывать приходится как на покупку способностей и строений, так и на улучшение юнитов и всего перечисленного. Легче всего это сделать на первых этапах аркадного режима (которые по аналогии с [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/alina_nomie/recommended/3590]PvZ[/url] имеют "суточные" названия - утро, день, вечер и ночь) - причем, обязательно с золотым топором, поскольку именно этот апгрейд позволяет Вам гриндить с удвоенной расторопностью. По мере прохождения Вам откроются все заблокированные достижения и юниты, среди которых можно найти персонажей из [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/40800/Super_Meat_Boy]Super Meat Boy[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/alina_nomie/recommended/113200]The Binding of Isaac[/url], Shellrazer, [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/224480/Octodad_Dadliest_Catch]Octodad[/url], Street Fighter и Mortal Kombat. Помимо этого, особо внимательные игроки смогут также найти еще с десяток великолепных пасхалок и отсылок, что отчасти вызвано связью разработчиков из [b]TreeFortress Games[/b] с элитной инди-тусовкой, куда вхожи The Behemoth, Young Horses и даже сам Эдмунд МакМиллен.
[b]Bardbarian[/b] блещет приятной глазу мультяшной flash-[b]графикой[/b], словно сошедшей с экранов смартфонов или планшетов. [b]Музыкальное сопровождение[/b] состоит из одной-единственной композиции - дуэта электрогитары и фортепиано. Также при призыве юнитов и активации различных способностей срабатывают особые эффекты и тембры, включая гитарные пассажи, значительно разбавляющие опостылевший и однообразный аудио фон. Что же касаемо [b]геймплея[/b], то на первых этапах он хоть и выглядит несколько скудным и даже убогим, однако с апгрейдом умений привычные уровни засверкают новыми гранями. Удобное [b]управление[/b] и быстродейственный [b]интерфейс[/b] также никаких нареканий у меня не вызывали.

[b]Вердикт:[/b] Потрясающий воображение колоритный и нестандартный [b]Tower Defense[/b] с целым морем развеселого гринда и фарма. Отлично сгодится для уютного и пикантного коротания вечеров, поскольку с наскоку взять этот шедевр однозначно не выйдет. 

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/alina_nomie/recommended/281750]➤ Ссылочка на предыдущий обзор ❣[/url]

А ежели Вам понравились данные обзоры, то смело подписывайтесь на мое курирование игр на соответствующей [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/30845640]странице[/url] в Steam Store. Также вступайте в [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/nomie]группу ♥ Nomie Games ♥[/url], полностью посвященную моим игровым обзорам.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198054248266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1555281794}
review: Very fun. But it is one of those games where you might get stuck on level and have to repeat it over and over and over and over. I got it on sale. And for the price I got it - it's definetly worth the money. I get frasturated with games like this so I probably won't play this as often or for as long as other games I own but it's a great game to fire up when you are bored and have like 15 minutes to entertain yourself before you become busy again. Each round doesn't take up much time so you can easily fire it up play a few rounds and turn it off. It doesn't take up much of your time. And it's easy to play on any old computer. My main beefy gaming pc obviously can handle it but I got this for my crappy laptop and it works great there. I wonder if they have a mobile version of this game. This would be a great phone game for sure.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218692180', 'num_games_owned': 1071, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 551, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 551, 'last_played': 1508400952}
review:
大概算是另类塔防，大佬（你）带着各类小弟去打敌人（小弟发动远程攻击，你得注意躲避敌人的攻击）
