author: {'steamid': '76561197966022897', 'num_games_owned': 3302, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 478, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 478, 'last_played': 1419713466}
review: Tower Defense games are a dime a dozen, but this one makes it new and fun.  You essentially control a mobile cluster of towers that follow you around and attack anything nearby.  The best way to describe it is Plants vs Zombies, if you remove the lanes, and can move freely around to attack the waves of invaders.  Great game, lots of powerups to purchase and characters to unlock each with their own pros and cons.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072797538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1613455178}
review: Bardbarian, is a hard to pin-down game. Is an RPG? not really since it lacks some core mechanics of that. is it a Tower Defense game? again, not really, since there are only two ttowers, and they are only available in pre-chosen locations during the late game(or early game if you grind). however, that matters not, as it is a great game, with a mix of skill and grinding required though. I could say more, but i can't think of anything, so just go play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042816315', 'num_games_owned': 809, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1428053087}
review:
I'd have to say this game is very fun. I was very pleased to buy this game and look forward to playing much more. Singleplayer mode's in this are fantastic and is very controller friendly. The description of the game tells you alot about it and manages to nail each word. From the art, to bosses, to looting gold. The simple storyline of Brad is also fantastic and you soon forget that you are the one leading. The crossover content is a big win & love not just the art, but SFX and music is very good too. The game is put together very well & Co-op features would be a real big seller. Workshop if they add it would spice up even the spicy'es of dishes.

I highly recommend this game, especially for that cute, adorable, silly ratcoon :)

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197995224666', 'num_games_owned': 3504, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 844, 'last_played': 1705097393}
review:
Bardbarian is a squad-based bullet-hell tower-defense rouge-like loot-questing role-playing game. If any two of those hyphenations sounds like your bag, then give bardbarian a look.

But seriously, Brad the Barbarian wants to be a bard, so he fashions his axe into a magic lute that he uses to summon and strengthen companions who wield actual weapons. Your "squad" will follow you around like "options" in a Gradius game, shooting at targets of opportunity while you guide them around fireballs and (eventually) lasers. Enemies emerge from three paths in the forest and shamble down pathways trying to reach and destroy the crystal in the center of town. When you inevitably fail, use the gold the goblins and skeletons and such drop to buy gear, upgrades and enhance your skills, then go out and do it all over again. There's also a Survival Mode and a Marathon Mode.

So like I said: Bardbarian is a squad-based bullet-hell tower-defense rouge-like loot-questing role-playing game. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198074672646', 'num_games_owned': 6653, 'num_reviews': 596, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1424729006}
review:
[h1]Bardbarian vous fait jouer un viking qui combat les méchants avec de la musique[/h1]


Combattre les méchants qui veulent envahir votre village avec de la musique, c’est la décision que vient de prendre votre guerrier, Brad le barbare. Mais, rassurez vous, son instrument de musique est magique et il va en faire pleurer des ennemis !

Avec son instrument de musique, Brad va pouvoir invoquer un archer, un bagarreur et un magicien noir. Tous (et bien plus d’autres par la suite) vont le suivre dans ses escarmouches contre l’ennemi.

Vous l’avez compris, Bardbarian est un jeu de défense. Vous devez empêcher toutes les forces ennemies de détruire le cristal qui trône sur la place du village.

Pour cela, tous les moyens sont bons et il faudra montrer aucune pitié.

Le prix du jeu est très correct et est à moins de 10 euros.

[url=www.graal.fr/2015/02/26/test-bardbarian-la-version-pour-steam/]Pour découvrir l’ensemble de mes impressions sur Bardbarian.[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198044114687', 'num_games_owned': 1803, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 819, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 780, 'last_played': 1446179327}
review:
도끼를 버린 바이킹이 기타를 들고 마을을 지키기위해 힘겹게 고군분투한다.
도끼를 들었다면 무적이었을 그를 바드로써도 무적이게 만들 수 있을까. (웃음)

가볍게 하기 좋은 디펜스 게임이다.
업그레이드 요소도 좋고, 나름 유닛도 다양하다.
다만, 출전할 수 있는 유닛 종류에 제한이 있기 때문에 결국에는 쓰는 애들만 쓰게 된다.
유닛을 다양하게 조합해가며 쓸 수 없는것은 좀 아쉬운 점이다.

업그레이드를 어느정도 하고나면 엔딩을 볼 수 있을 정도로 적당한 난이도를 갖고있으며,
도전과제 달성도 무난하게 할 수 있는 수준이다.
게임을 다 깬 후에도 무한이나 미니게임이 있어 좀 더 즐길 수 있다만,
도전과제까지 모두 달성하고 나면 흥미가 떨어지는건 막지 못하는 듯.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122581768', 'num_games_owned': 1493, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1480599448}
review:
Not a bad game but its suffer a great amount of farming and level up your upgrade and stuff......which is pretty boring after a while.

Gameplay is very simple but yet different than normal tower defend games as you control a hero which can call for unit to help you. But its more of a bullet-dodging game as you barely do anything except dodging stuff. The amount of upgrade and overall unit is good but not best because of limited number of unit, hoping to have a lot of combination of unit i can use at the same time. Graphic is cartoonish style, simple and clean.

Price-wise, for several hour i think its not that bad. Good if you have some hours to kill,

author: {'steamid': '76561198021533360', 'num_games_owned': 289, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1425780108}
review:
[h1]Opinión[/h1]
Una especie de [i]"tower defense"[/i] de esos que están tan de moda.

Este título es un port del juego para móviles, por lo es que es bastante simple en sus mecánicas, eso sí, es entretenido y su apartado artístico me ha parecido bastante bueno y simpático. Además contamos con cierta rejugabilidad ya que disponemos de los modos [b]Endless[/b] y [b]Survival[/b].

[h1]Contras[/h1]
Cobrarte 7,99 euros (es lo que vale a fecha de este análisis) en un juego [b]IOS[/b] me parece excesivo. Su traducción deja mucho que desear y la música es algo monótona.

[h1]¿¿Lo recomiendo??[/h1]
✔️ Es divertido y además de logros fáciles, así que es un juego recomendable. Eso si, espera a alguna oferta... 

[h1]Valoración: 6/10[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198014445897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 237, 'playtime_forever': 912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 912, 'last_played': 1425328200}
review:
8/10

An incredibly fun game. It feels a lot like a combination of tower defense and arcade games... As if it would be a tower defense game, except you have to move the "towers" around with you while making sure that not only enemies don't reach their target but also that you and your "towers" survive too.

There's a large ammount of characters to use and a lot of different strategies with combining different characters and plenty of unlockables and upgrades will keep the game fresh for a long time. Other gameplay modes adds a bit more variety and Insane difficulty adds quite a lot of challenge while also not being impossible to beat.

If there's ever a second Bardbarian game, I'd love to see a longer campaign and perhaps multiplayer!

author: {'steamid': '76561198022253150', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 534, 'last_played': 1424811413}
review: Bardbarian , un gioco emhhh... interessante..... non c'è da dire molto è un indie, non sono un grande amante di questi giochi 0 trama 100% gameplay , però è divertente ed abbastanza unico nel suo genere visto che l'anello debole della squadra è proprio l'eroe hahahahaha , comunque è un semplice tower defense ad orde in cui voi e i vostri alleati scendete in campo e difendete appunto la "torre" dai nemici... fine.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987746856', 'num_games_owned': 920, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1425216331}
review:

Glad I did, have really enjoyed this first hour of gameplay and found it entertaining, the best Tower Defense game I have had the pleasure of trying!

Will not be uninstalling as originally intended but keep it for occassional gameplay!

author: {'steamid': '76561198094705042', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1423797480}

author: {'steamid': '76561197991103051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 252, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1425102842}
review:
Its a mobile game ported to PC without much addition from what I can tell. Youre playing one map over and over with very slow progression (unless you play one insane mode apparently.) It starts out pretty fun but quickly becomes repetative and boring. Youre going to have to replay the same bit over and over and over to upgrade your units to advance.

There isn't much skill involved. Its mostly just a level your guys higher than what you are fighting and you win.

I would have liked to see different parts of the town for each section to help vary it up a bit. It would have also been nice to have something for the player character to do as youll just be running around letting the npcs do all the work.

The soundtrack is good but its just that. A track. As in singular. It plays on repeat the whole game and gets old pretty quick.

All in all I dont feel the game really belongs on PC with the minimal effort put in to the port. It wears its welcome out realy quick. However, I would imagine it would be alright in short 10 minute bursts on the toilet. So if your pc is in the water closet then go for it I guess?

author: {'steamid': '76561198100451955', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1423360021}
review:
Tons of fun for people who likes Tower Defense games, I think it's great, 8/10!

Ever wonder what Plants vs Zombies might be like if you could move through the garden? WONDER NO MORE! Bardbarian is labeled as RPG-Strategy and it's true, you can take up to 4 different units to battle and as you progress you upgrade your favorite units abilities and more unit slots (only 4 kinds at  a time, but you can summon multiple units later on).

But Hot, why did you talk about Tower Defense you drunk Batman?! Well, there are 3 lanes of enemies and you must manage to kill each one of them with your units, you can chose which units to summon and when to play a guitar solo to give them different boosts (speed, defense and attack), so it's like chosing which tower/champions to use and upgrade to progress more.

As a final thought, to enjoy more the game aim for the Golden Axe Upgrade as soon as possible to get double gold and kill all the Bosses you can! Then chose the 3 units that suit the most your playstyle and focus on upgrading them, I suggest one long range, one mid and the last one is up to you, just try to not take too many glass cannons.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143301307', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1429910298}
review:
Ma premiére évaluation sur ce jeu a été négative mais apres etre revenu sur le jeu j'ai changer d'avis

Points positif :

-Les persos sont beau et mignon
-Une histoire courte mais présente
-Des upgrades pour presque tout
-Une large gamme de personnage jouables
-Bien animé
-Un raton laveur
-Des cartes a échanger

Points négatif :

-Trop de farming
-La difficulter augmente tres vite
-Le prix du jeu  que je trouve trop élevé

Il y a moins de points négatif que positif mais si ont aiment pas le fait de farmer , le jeu est tres lassant malgres ça l'univer du jeu attachant ne rend pas ça trop "chiant"

Le jeu est bien mais beaucoup de choses devraient etre améliorer

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198057849814', 'num_games_owned': 1158, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1424226543}
review:
[h1]AT A GLANCE[/h1]
(Full review follows below)

[list]
[*] [b]Game Name:[/b] Bardbarian
[*] [b]Original Release:[/b] 2014
[*] [b]Genre Tags:[/b] Defense; Strategy; RPG; Casual; Musical  
[*] [b]My Overall Grade:[/b] A-
[*] [b]Estimated Playtime (Campaign):[/b] 3-7 hours
[*] [b]Multiplayer Aspect:[/b] None
[*] [b]Recommended To:[/b] Established fans of the genre; Those intrigued by the genre; Novelty seekers; Casual gamers
[/list]

[h1]REVIEW[/h1]
[b]Bardbarian[/b] is quite the fun game.  It blends elements of tower defense, RPG, action-strategy, and bullet-dodging to form a short-and-sweet little game.  Personally, the game felt a lot like the “Protect the Queen” games I used to play on [i]StarCraft[/i] custom maps.   There are no truly innovative mechanics to the game, but the way the pieces come together do manage to form a game that has a strong charm of novelty.

The game is short.  It took me just under 5 hours to earn all achievements.  That’s OK though, because it was a fun 5 hours and I didn’t really need any more.  If you find yourself wanting more you can compete on the leaderboards.
 
Also, the game is casual.  Even on the “insane” difficulty, the game becomes simple once you’ve bought enough upgrades.  As someone who enjoys casual games, I really felt the balance of difficulty in this game was very enjoyable.  You have to pay attention and play, but you won’t ever find yourself frustrated.  Having said that, people who like very difficult games may find themselves left wanting by [b]Bardbarian[/b].

The gameplay itself is extremely simple.  You’ll have it all figured out in the first minute and it won’t change much after that.  There are new units and upgrades which you unlock that spice things up as you progress.  But I will admit, the content is rather limited.

The graphics are "cartoonish" and simple, but they fit the atmosphere.  The music is not bad by any means, but I felt it could have been a little more epic and various considering the game has strong musical undertones.   The controls are fluid and intuitive.  The game is stable; I experienced no glitches or crashing.

In summary, I would say [b]Bardbarian[/b] is very fun and worth playing.  It’s simple enough that almost anyone should be able to enjoy the gameplay.  If you are itching for something fresh and a little different you can probably get some fun out of this game.

[i][url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/murphyslawyercuration#curation]Follow my curation page to see more of my recommendations![/url][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561197995158485', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1059, 'last_played': 1465679354}
review:
A cute little game with the addictive qualities of both tower defense and bullet-hell games.
=-=-=-=-=

ADORATION:
Great Price, 
Excellent Replay Value, 
Leaderboards kept on Steam, 
Charming and colorful, 
Plenty of gameplay time for my $8. 
"Tower Defense" rather cleverly combined with "Bullet Hell" tactics.

CRITICISM:
I know its also a bullet-hell game, but the tower defense bit is badly balanced. I was juggling the toughest enemies in the game with push-backs and stun before it was even close to over. Waves 1-18 are child's play, and then 19 and 20 will kick your ass if you don't have a balanced party of stuns, slows, and push-backs at your desposal. I felt too powerful most of the time in Normal Mode, making it feel kind'a grindy.


TIPS TO THE UNWARY:
-Skip normal mode and play on insane. You'll do less gold-grinding that way, and the game is actually better balanced. You also won't have to play the game twice to get all the achievements. (I got all but one)

-Don't forget to SCROLL DOWN in the unlockables and permenant upgrades screens. I didn't get the "double your gold" item until almost the very end, and felt very much the fool for it.

-The wizard's pushback/stun is the most potent thing in the game. Upgrade him early and JUGGLE all your enemies!


TDLR:

Definitely recommended! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198032183811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 564, 'last_played': 1442257481}
review:
Bardbarian manages to give something new in the tower defense style games, while being fun and chalenging. The graphics are nothing great, they are flash based, the music while not bad starts to become repetitive because there is only one track at the hordes. Gameplay is where you'll find the fun here. You control the bardbarian Brad, and you summon an assortment of other units to help  you deal with the hordes while defending a town crystal from being destroyed. The units you summon while follow your steps and auto atack enemies based on their range and abilities.

You have tons of upgrades to the units, town and Brad himself wich you unlock with money from the loot of your runs.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198009952726', 'num_games_owned': 1658, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 790, 'last_played': 1420162535}
review:
Great and very addictive simple indie game with few RPG elements. Honestly one of the best indies i ever played. Got it from bundle, but i need to admit that £5.59 is not much for such production. Anyway I'm a bit sad, because Bardbarian lacks of replayability, which is really needed in this genre in my opinion. Didn't really like the survival mode, but who cares when the main features are fantastic.

So if you didn't get it yet, i can strongly recommend Bardbarian to all RPG/tower defence fans, especially if you are bored and willing to have some fun.

My rating: 85/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198000861562', 'num_games_owned': 3271, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 986, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1428616358}
review:
I actually lanched this game to get the trading cards that comes with it. I tried the game out and im surprised on how good it is. You play through levels, kill enemies and try to defend your throne. When you kill creeps they drop gold, which you can use to upgrade your followers health, damage, etc. 

The graphics are okay. Looks like a cute cartoon-ish style, almost like a mobile game. The game runs fine though and the PC port seems to be solid in every way. Since there's a lot of grinding involved in this, you might wanna play this game for short periods at a time.

I'm enjoying the music that comes with it. It's a rock song with some nice drum rhythm, and I think it suits the game really well. As you progress you unlock new followers that have different abillities, and like I said, you upgrade them with the gold you collect. It starts of easy but it gets hard pretty quick. 

definitely a nice little game, but due to the repetitive grinding you might want to pick it up on sale or in a bundle. It depends on if you like that kind of thing or not.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036580357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 622, 'last_played': 1449595233}
review:
Tellement addictif...
La prise en main est facile avec le pad et on n'a de cesse de vouloir faire évoluer notre bardbarre et son équipe pour sauver le village lors de ce jour terrible ou l'ennemi souhaite voir notre tête loin de notre corps. 

Après une petite dizaine d'heures j'ai réussi à collecter tous les succès mais j'ai tout de même envie de perséverer pour améliorer mes scores !

author: {'steamid': '76561198066669262', 'num_games_owned': 418, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1423316074}
review:
Brad the Barbarian has grown tired of the XP grind, but he can't stop the need to have to farm gold.
Bardbarian is a clever twist of taking elements from RPGs and Tower Defense into an action game where you are protecting your town's crystal from monsters, except that YOU are not. Brad decided he doesn't want to be a fighter, but a musician. So now he plays rock music. He summons warriors, temporarily boosts their stats, and stuns enemies with his music. The power of music eh?
There is a Campaign, Survival mode, and Endless (running as far as you can) mode. The last two are both challenges where you can compare your skill against your friends and the rest of the world, and also sources where you can earn gold to upgrade for the campaign. The campaign is pretty tough. Mainly because it will require a combination of skill, and the right upgrades from the countless times of playing.
You'll definitely get your money's worth buying this game, if this is the kind of thing you are into. If you like Tower Defense, and you don't mind working the hours needed to earn that "in-game" money, you'll probably dig this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977461855', 'num_games_owned': 804, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1421710349}

author: {'steamid': '76561198101362468', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 735, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 735, 'last_played': 1421423389}
review:
通关7小时，全成就20小时+，因为其中一段没开steam所以也不知道确切时间
慈善包入手的
一开始玩还是非常有意思的，塔防和弹幕游戏的结合，一周目的时候就算是刷钱也还是很有乐趣的
但是越往后越无聊，尤其开了insane模式之后，开始变得很无聊，基本上有10多个小时都是从第一关开始刷钱，刷到死
成就大部分很简单，但是有两个很难，一个是insane到达第二天，一个肾真。全成就。其他的想要拿到的话大概12小时就足够了
还是给推荐吧，如果玩的时间在7小时以内，还是很不错的作品的

author: {'steamid': '76561198115195895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1444999309}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999485050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 767, 'last_played': 1420349600}
review:
Bardbarian é um jogo bastante divertido e desafiador , no estilo tower defense.

Você controla um Bardo que ao toca seu machado invocando inúmeros tipos de criaturas que possuem uma habilidade diferente, fazendo sua própria estrategia para vencer as hordas de inimigos que vem a cada round.
Com seu machado você também pode usar três poderes diferentes , como aumentar o ataque , defesa, e velocidade de movimento o que ajudam muito ao longo do gameplay.

Apesar de ser divertido o jogo se torna facil ao longo do seu desenrolar , sendo apenas necessário fazer upgrades no personagem para zerar o jogo com facilidade o que torna quase impossível ser atingido pelos inimigos.

Concluindo Barbarian é um jogo bem feito, apesar de não ter historia alguma torna uma experiencia bacana a experimentar, principalmente aos jogares que optam a jogar jogos offline que é o principal foco do jogo.

Para não se arrepender de comprar o jogo aguarde uma promoção, porque o jogo realmente é uma otima opção para entrar na sua lista de games na steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975183383', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1677694421}
review:
Bardbarian es un juego simple y ameno, bueno para echar ratos sin pensar demasiado y relajarte un poco. 

Con una mecanica simple de oleadas de enemigos, encarnas a un bardo guerrero que utiliza su hacha-laúd para entonar solos de guitarra. Con ellos puedes invocar aliados que te seguirán y atacarán a tus enemigos, y tambien puedes potenciar temporalmente a tu grupo para que haga mas daño, tenga mas armadura o sea mas rápido.
El objetivo del juego es ir venciendo oleada tras oleada (hasta un máximo de 20) a todos los enemigos para proteger la gema del pueblo, la cual si es destruida, dará la partida por terminada. Cada 5 oleadas aperecerá un jefe que te pondrá las cosas difíciles.
El oro que recoges te sirve para comprar potenciadores permanentes tanto para todas tus habilidades como para mejorar las caracteristicas de tus aliados y de los edificios del pueblo.

Podría catalogar Bardbarian como una especie de tower defense, aunque aqui no puedes colocar trampas ni armas, tan solo llevar contigo un numero limitado de aliados. La energía o maná del juego son notas musicales, que consigues derrotando enemigos o generándolas automáticamente manteniendote quieto en el sitio.

Los gráficos son muy graciosos, muy estilo cartoon. Tiene una variedad adecuada de enemigos con diferentes comportamientos y tipos de ataque, y los jefes son duros de pelar. La musica es buena, no se hace repetitiva y tiene mucho ritmo. Le da mucha gracia al juego.
Como extra posee dos modos de juegos alternativos, uno de supervivencia, donde debes aguantar todo lo que puedas sin poder invocar aliados (solo los recoges segun van apareciendo) y uno de carrera, donde debes intentar llegar lo mas lejos posible huyendo de un muro de bestias y esquivando enemigos y disparos.

Bardbarian no tiene mayor pretensión que hacer pasar un buen rato, siendo entrenido, dificil hasta cierto punto. No espereis un juegazo triple A, pero si teneis muchos ratos libres sin nada que hacer y os apetece una partidita, estaría bien probarlo. Si lo comprais en una rebaja, mejor que mejor.

Valoración: 6,5 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198067763494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1450, 'last_played': 1421273587}
review:
das spiel macht spaß, die idee mit musik die einheiten zu beschwören, damit diese für einen kämpfen können ist noch relativ unverbraucht. die musik ist ziemlich gut und die level sind fordernd aber niemals unfair. allerdings, wird es ab tag 2 insbesondere in der welle nach dem großen zwischengegner schon verdammich schwer, selbst in leicht. es fehlt auch ein wenig die abwechslung. vielleicht wäre ein multiplayer mit mehr gegnern drin gewesen. und ein großer schwachpunkt ist ganz klar der kristall. klar, ziel ist es den kristall so gut es geht zu beschützen, weil man ja sonst verliert wenn der kristall zerstört wird. aber ich finds schon bissel blöde, dass im LEICHTEN modus selbst die schwächsten gegner so ziemlich genauso viel schaden machen können, wie die stärkeren gegner. das hätte man echt besser regulieren können. was mich aber wirklich stört ist die tatsache, dass es keine möglichkeit gibt den kristall in irgendeiner form reparieren zu können. man kann doch seine eigene energie auch wieder herstellen, warum dann nicht auch die des kristalls?! man könnte ja z.b. gegen einen bestimmten geldbetrag einen energiepunkt des kristalls wieder aufladen. oder man gibt z.b. in der schmiede den auftrag gegen einen bestimmten geldbetrag den kristall wenigstens zum teil reparieren zu lassen. ich finde so wäre das spiel wesentlich fairer. so aber muss man, wenn kurz nicht aufpasst und z.b. zum mittag der kristall schon beschädigt wurde, bis zum ende des spiels diesen schaden mitnehmen und noch mehr aufpassen, als man ohnehin schon muss was das spielen schon ziemlich erschwert und etwas an spielspaß einbüßen lässt.

aber trotz dieses doch recht großen schwachpunkst, überwiegt der spielspaß und wer auf tower defense spiele steht ist hier genau richtig.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023476291', 'num_games_owned': 2073, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 421, 'last_played': 1421128863}

author: {'steamid': '76561197961141742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1421009496}

author: {'steamid': '76561198018161255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 242, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1420743165}
review:
RPG 요소와 디펜스 요소가 융합된 RPG 디펜스. 음유 시인을 뜻하는 Bard와 야만인을 뜻하는 Barbarian을 합쳐 제목을 만들었다. [Diablo] 이후로 Barbarian이라는 단어는 야만인이라는 뜻보다는 야만 용사 느낌으로 쓰이는 경우가 많아진 것 같다. 근육질을 한 야만 용사인 주인공은 굉장히 강해 보이지만, 겉모습과는 다르게 게임 내에서 전혀 공격하지 않는다. 그 점이 이 게임의 큰 특징이다.

 독일의 전래동화 '피리 부는 사나이'와 비슷하게 주인공은 도끼 모양의 류트(?)를 켜면서 부하들을 이끈다. 음악적 영감(음표)를 자원으로 삼아 부하들을 소환하고, 부하들의 공격력을 상승시키는 연주를 하거나 방어력 혹은 이동 속도를 올려주는 연주를 할 수도 있다. 화면에 보이는 적들에게 충격을 주어 진격을 늦추는 연주를 할 수도 있다. 적들을 처치하며 획득한 금화로 부하들을 업그레이드할 수도 있고, 마을을 업그레이드하거나 아니면 주인공 자체를 업그레이드할 수도 있다.

 이렇듯 모은 금화로 업그레이드하고, 하루의 분기마다 있는 보스를 해치워나간다. 플레이어가 맞이하는 적들의 공격은 '하루' 안에 이루어지는 것이라서 아침, 정오, 저녁, 밤이 나누어져 있다. 졸개들이 출몰하는 단계가 지나면 아침의 끝에는 아침의 보스가 있고, 정오의 끝에 정오의 보스가 있는 식이다. 총 4개의 큰 단계가 있는 것이고, 마지막 밤의 보스를 제거하고 나면 본 게임은 끝나게 된다.

 기본 게임 외에 다른 게임도 몇 가지 있는데, '오래 살아남기'와 '멀리 가기'다. 오래 살아남는 것은 사방에서 무작위로 출몰하는 적의 공격을 피해 곳곳에 흩어져 있는 아군을 모아 적을 해치우고 오래 버티는 게임이다. 병력을 잃으면 무작위로 출현할 때까지 병력 보충이 이루어지지 않기 때문에 잘 살리는 것이 중요하다. 멀리 가는 것 역시도 오래 살아남는 것이 목표다. 왼편에서 적이 몰려오고 있는 와중에 오른편에서 나타나는 적의 공격과 장애물을 피해 최대한 멀리까지 도달하는 것이 주요 내용이다. 적의 공격에 한 방만 맞아도 죽기 때문에 유저의 실력에 따라 어렵다고 느껴질 수도 있다.

 Insane 모드로 본 게임을 다 끝내고 나면 시작할 수 있는 'Day 2'모드도 있다. 앞서 말한 것처럼, 본 게임은 '하루'를 다루는 것이기 때문에 그 이후의 일이라고 볼 수 있다. Day 2에 도달했을 때에는 부하들이나 주인공이나 업그레이드가 꽤 되어있는 상태이지만, 적의 레벨도 상당히 높고, 한번에 출몰하는 양도 많아서 꽤 난도가 높다. 대신 처치 후 획득할 수 있는 금화의 양이 꽤 많아서 본 게임을 다 깨고 도전 과제를 해금하기 위해 돈을 모을 때 플레이하면 좋다.

 전체적으로 알찬 구성이다. 부하들의 종류도 다양하고 개성 있고, 업그레이드 종류도 다양하다. 기본 컨셉도 독특해서 게임의 고유한 매력이 되었다. 업그레이드가 완료된 병력들을 줄줄이 끌고 다니다보면 마치 움직이는 성을 보는 것 같다. 움직이는 타워 디펜스의 느낌이다. 초반에는 데리고 다니는 병력의 힘이 약하기 때문에 난도가 어렵다고 느껴지지만, 반복해서 도전하고 돈을 모아 업그레이드를 하다보면 금세 해결할 수 있다. 게임 자체가 어렵지는 않기 때문이다. 보스 몬스터의 패턴도 정말 단순해서 힘만 갖춰지면 극복할 수 있다.

 재미있고 간단히 즐길 수 있어서 별 고민 없이 즐기기엔 좋다. 아쉬운 점이 한 가지 있다면, 부하들의 개성이 각각 독특하긴 하지만 결국에는 몇몇 유닛만 단계적으로 사용하게 된다는 점이다. 제작사가 열심히 고민하고 준비해놓았을 것 같은데, 결국 세 가지 유닛만 단계적으로 써도 게임은 쉽게 이길 수 있기 때문에 그 외의 유닛은 Day 2를 도전하거나 하는 일 외에는 쓸 일이 없었기 때문에 아쉬운 마음이 든다. 한편으로는 병력 조합에 대해 큰 고민 없이 한 가지로 통일하면 되었기 때문에 더욱 마음이 편했던 것도 있다. 이런 소소한 아쉬운 점을 제외한다면 재미있게, 쉽게 즐길 수 있는 게임이다. 머리 아플 게 전혀 없다.

* 도전 과제를 위해서라면 Insane 모드로 시작하는 것을 권한다. 난도가 크게 어렵지도 않고, 보스 단계가 두드러지게 차이나는 정도인데, 아침과 낮에 보스가 두 마리 나오는 정도이다. 그런데 이 점이 오히려 장점이라고 할 수 있는데, 패턴이 크게 어렵지 않아서 쉽게 이길 수 있으면서도 돈은 더 많이 획득할 수 있기 때문이다. 보통 난이도로 진행하다가 Insane으로 시작하였는데, 진행이 좀 더 수월하고 빨랐다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086162912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1420883299}
review:
This is a game that prioritizes avatar strength over skill. No matter how skillfull you are, you cannot progress in the game without buying upgrades with coins. You'll simply be steamrolled. 

In terms of skill, there's not much involved. And that just defies the point of playing a game to me. This would probably be better suited as a free mobile game. It's really not worth $7.99

Still, I offer props for the decent soundtrack and artwork.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082200538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1485081300}
review:
Gra o prostym założeniu - nie daj złym potworom zniszczyć Kryształu w Twoim mieście.
Ot tyle.
Do dyspozycji mamy Brad'a (tytułowego Bardbariana), który za pomocą swojej toporp-lutni (axe-lute) wygrywa różne solóweczki i dzięki nim przywołuje do obrony natchnionych mieszkańców miasta: Łuczników, brawlerów, krasnoludy, tarczowników, healerów itp.
Kombinacji jednostek jest dużo i można grę przejść na naście sposobów. Oprócz tego mamy do dyspozycji ulepszenia, które pomogą nam szybciej się poruszać czy też generować więcej nutek, za które przywołujemy jednostki, bądź wzmacniamy aktualne.
Rozgrywka główna podzielona jest na 4 etapy: ranek , południe, wieczór i noc a te z kolei na kilka fal.
Ogólnie przyjemny odmóżdzacz nie wymaga ciągłego siedzenia w rozgrywce a gra zapisuje się na bierząco.

Polecam

author: {'steamid': '76561198055170675', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 486, 'last_played': 1491655567}

author: {'steamid': '76561197998576786', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 478, 'last_played': 1427888306}
review:
BardBarian is the typical game that someone plays once in a while when is bored or just want to have some fun.

It has a story mode, with 4 chapters/20 levels, a survival mode, and a "run as long as you can" mode, that increases the gameplay length, which it's something positive.

Basically, you just use the keyboard or gamepad to control Bard, and recruit other characters to fight for you. 
They will stick with Bard and they will automatically attack the enemies.
No, you can't attack with Bard, the only thing you can do is to use some specials to increase the damage, defense or speed of your characters.

But it's fun anyway. 
You can unlock and combine multiple characters, each one with his special ability/attack.

I acquired this game on Humble Bundle, so it was very cheap. 
And it came with android version too, which is very solid and enjoyable like the PC Version.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965063903', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1420400495}
review:
[u]Bardbarian Review[/u]

[u]Gameplay[/u]
Das Spielprinzip von Bardbarian gleicht einer Art von Tower Defense. Das Spiel kommt jedoch ohne Tower aus. Der Held selbst erfüllt die Funktion des Supporters. Er lässt sich frei über das Spielfeld bewegen und verstärkt die Truppen mit diversen Zaubern oder kann Gegnermassen mit einem Finisher stunnen. Um den Held sammeln sich die angeheuerten Truppen und dienen als bewegliche Tower um die Gegnermassen zu vernichten. Dabei muss der Held diese zu den Gegnern steuern und auch den Angriffen ausweichen.

[u]Story[/u]
Eine Story ist per se nicht vorhanden. Es gibt eine Art Kampagne, die sich über 4 Abschnitte verteilt und nach jedem Abschnitt wartet ein Boss. Das Spiel kann in einem normalen Modus und in einem schweren (Insane) Modus gestartet werden. Neben der Kampagne gibt es auch noch andere Spielmodi, wie einen Survival Modus.

[u]Langzeitmotivation[/u]
Das Spiel weiß durchaus auch auf lange Sicht zu motivieren. Mit verdientem Gold werden die Truppen, die Stadt, oder auch der Held aufgewertet. Die verschiedenen Spielmodi motivieren neben der Kampagne zusätzlich und bieten quasi endloses Gameplay, da sowohl Survival, als auch der Running Modus kein Ende besitzen. Die dazugehörigen Steam Highscores und Erfolge spornen zu besseren Leistungen an.

[u]Fazit[/u]
Ich habe mir anfangs nicht viel erwartet und bin wirklich begeistert. Tower Defense mal anders und vorallem auch mit ordentlich Humor. Das Spiel nimmt sich nicht selbst ernst und hält einen dauerhaft bei Laune. Für kleines Geld kann man hier endlose Stunden Spaß haben. Ich finde das Spiel ist allerdings mehr etwas für zwischendurch. Dauerhaft suchteln artet dann doch in Monotonie aus.

[u]Anmerkung[/u]
Ein faden Beigeschmack hat das Spiel. Bei einigen (auch Freunden von mir) funktioniert das Spiel leider nicht, bzw. ist mit immensen Frameeinbrüchen verbunden. Dies hängt wohl mit diversen Grafikkarten zusammen, die eine Funktion des Spieles nicht richtig unterstützen. Fundierte Listen bestehen indess leider nicht. Ist also wohl eher Glückssache. Da es bei mir läuft, habe ich allerdings nicht weiter nachgeforscht.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994863068', 'num_games_owned': 1004, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1420418810}
review:
[h1] El Tower Defense que seguramente elegiría Eddie Riggs… [/h1]

Brad esta harto de ser un barbaro, cansado del grindeo de XP decide perseguir su sueño de hacer musica en lugar de solamente derramar sangre, fusionando un laud con una vieja hacha se prepara para defender su pueblo... una vez mas.

Hay que aclarar que esta es una adaptación de un juego de iOS, pero que no llega como un simple port sino que ademas incluye nuevos modos de juego y unidades únicas para su versión de Steam directas de otros juegos indies (veremos a [b]Octodad, Super Meat Boy, ShellRazer e Isaac[/b] )

Este es un tower defense diferente a todos los demás, lejos de poner unidades en un camino predeterminado uno reúne su propio grupo para ir a combatir a los enemigos que llegaran desde 3 caminos; es simple, adictivo y se ve extraordinariamente bien.

Aunque son solo 20 niveles (mas un modo +), una dificultad insane y 2 modos alternativos en realidad es un juego bastante divertido y que te mantiene enganchado el tiempo suficiente hasta por lo menos obtener todos sus logros.

El único pero que le podría encontrar, debido a que fue pensado para móviles, es que la música llega a ser repetitiva después de una 6ta pasada... pero pueden solucionarlo poniendo el OST de [b]Brutal Legend[/b] de fondo (mi recomendación) y verán este pequeño tower defense como un pequeño guiño a las aventuras de aquel Roadie consentido de todos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111691001', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1582300115}

author: {'steamid': '76561197989651867', 'num_games_owned': 1060, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1457390250}
review:
This game is pretty awesome in its simpleness.

This game is for the gamer who doesn't like to learn a ton of stuff only to be able to play the game propperly. Sometimes reffered to as the 'casual gamer'. 

Everyone has his moments when you're hungover, sick or just lazy and want to play a game, but don't want to read books about the fluffin' story. This game is just that. Fun, upgrades, simple and original.

The graphics are okay and it's absolutely worth the money.

Get it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144974149', 'num_games_owned': 3847, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1606374852}
review:
Brutal Legend + Plants vs Zombies

Unlike Brutal Legend, Bardbarian is honest about what it is (the irony... because it’s a mobile port...mobile games are prone to neglect mentioning just how expensive they are; not really honest... anyone? Jokes); there is no open-world or sidequests tacked on***
Unlike Plants vs Zombies, you are free to move about; not bound to setting up your towers/plants.

You are Brad, a barbarian who has rigged his axe into a lute. Monsters are attacking the village. You use your axe/lute (so "axe") to call companions; you've further solo's to buff yourself and those followers. A dynamic conga-line, you weave between enemies' projectiles, enabling your companions to return fire. You collect Gold (you can buy a Ratcoon to collect the loot for you) to purchase upgrades.

Very addicting.

***There are two other game modes in addition to the Campaign:
--Endless plants you into the thick of it; you only have your three Buff solo's at your disposal. Companions/Health randomly drop. The challenge is to recruit those Companions and not have them die THE SECOND they start following you. The game claims that this is a good mode for farming gold. Too bad your Ratcoon is absent; So sad that Companions (your only means of dispatching enemies) survive for mere seconds. Totally unfair, in my opinion.
--Escape has you running from a wall of darkness. No companions to worry about, no strategy in using solo's; strictly a runner mode - one hit kills you. It's much more fun than Endless, though hardly related to the main game.

Parting Words: 
Town Drunk's barf slows down enemies; 
Super Meat Boy and Octodad are unlockable companions.
The HUD is too big, even though the UI is said to have been "revamped."



...I just now read "About This Game":
"An awesome Rock/Metal original soundtrack by Maximum Satan "
...why...j-just why?... Damn :/

EDIT 2: Get on Insane Mode ASAP and farm Escape; that's where the money is. Granted, I think the prices of Upgrades scale with the larger amount of gold you receive, but progress still seems to go faster than it does in Normal Mode(?)

author: {'steamid': '76561198019695560', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 311, 'last_played': 1518453524}
review:
Odeio jogos "grind-to-win". Ficar repetindo a mesma coisa, wave após wave é um saco. Compra itens mais fortes, avance mais waves, morra, volte....ahhhhhhhhhhhh.

Peguei esse jogo por indicação de amigos. E devo dizer, é uma dos MELHORES grind-to-win que eu já joguei na vida.

Engraçado, desafiador e com muitos solos de guitarra (ou nesse caso "Axe-Lute"), você se diverte muito e quando percebe o game acabou. Quer dizer, a história principal... você pode ficar jogando até terminar tudo, mas eu não tenho esse saco, já que terminei o principal.

Em suma, um ótimo jogo. Bem simples, criativo e um excelente passatempo. Recomendo fortemente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020231431', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2006, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1094, 'last_played': 1420605525}

author: {'steamid': '76561198139485337', 'num_games_owned': 720, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 478, 'last_played': 1420041030}
review:
Un Tower Defense más;

La curva de dificultad, como en todos los juegos de este género, se puede romper con facilidad. Una vez descubres que unidad está OP y mejoras 4 parámetros básicos, puedes llegar al final sin ninguna dificultad.

Bastante repetitivo, muy pocos enemigos y todos muy iguales, solo una de las magias es útil, el resto están de relleno, como el 90% de las unidades y mejoras; me ha dado apenas 3 o 4 horas de juego, conseguir todos los logros no es dificil, es largo... y repetitivo... por tanto aburrido.

No recomiendo pagar por un juego como este, cuando no tiene nada innovador y puedes encontrar cientos parecidos y hasta mejores en webs gratuitas como Minijuegos

author: {'steamid': '76561198041356905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 1364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1101, 'last_played': 1420563872}
review: Bardbarian je báječná "defenders" kreslená akce. Hned jak porazíte první vlnu nepřátel, zjistíte že nemůžete přestat dál bojovat a hra vás v vcucne jak vysavač smetí... Pokud by měl někdo z vás zájem, tak jsem pro hru napsal i češtinu... Užijte si hru Bardbarian ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197962122314', 'num_games_owned': 828, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1419949378}
review:
gioco pagato pochissimo ma quasi a sopresa davvero divertente e ben fatto, ti prende molto ed ha un sistema di gioco in stile tower defence ma senza path o le solite torrette, qui si expa i pg che in autofire seguono a ruota il nostro protagonista ed il fulcro del gioco è determinato dalla capacità di schivare i colpi dei nemici e passargli vicino tanto basta per attivare il perimetro di azione di fuoco dei propri seguaci, il tutto condito dal solito gold che utilizzi per aumentare man mano tutto il set di potenziamenti.
Consigliatissimo se poi lo si paga sotto i 2 euro direi capolavoro!
voto 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197995295537', 'num_games_owned': 953, 'num_reviews': 286, 'playtime_forever': 809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 578, 'last_played': 1446591348}
review: Unterhaltsames Spiel für zwischendurch. Man verteidigt einen Kristall gegen anstürmende Feinde indem man eine Party übers Feld steuert deren Besetzung man frei wählen kann.Die Schergen haften am Spieler und ballern auf alles was sich bewegt(mit verschiedenen Reichweiten bzw Waffen.Magier,Bogenschützen,Heiler...Kampfschildkröten gilt es freizuschalten, wie einige Buffs und schnickschnack die/den man für Gold kaufen kann welches Feinde fallen lassen. Hoch leveln...nochmal versuchen und von vorn.  73 / 100

author: {'steamid': '76561197992242281', 'num_games_owned': 1265, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 629, 'last_played': 1419993014}

author: {'steamid': '76561197984219654', 'num_games_owned': 775, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1454192152}
review:
Simples e Divertido. Praticamente um jogo de celular, Bardbarian tem uma ótima trilha sonora e uma mecânica simples o suficiente para uma boa distração. Você encarna um bárbaro-bardo que tem que ajudar a defender sua cidade (ou o cristal gigante da sua cidade) de hordas de inimigos clichês dos mundos de fantasia medieval, fazendo melhorias na sua equipe de "summons" conforme joga e adquire gold. Destaque para a aparição aleatória de personagens de jogos indies, como Octodad , Isaac e Meatboy.

+ Ótimo para passar tempo
+ Trilha sonora excelente
+ Temática e personagens divertidos

review:
Tower Defense обзавелся новым маст хевом.
Пусть она не такая длинная как тот же Defenders quest. Но затянет вас не хуже. Если вы ничего из это не поняли. Тогда вам нужно просто ее купить. Отличная игра!
Я бы советовал ее всем окружающим себя людям, но моя бабушка не поймет образ алкаша, который своей блевотиной замедляет вражеских юнитов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048987172', 'num_games_owned': 1778, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1419887285}
review:
TL;DR; Biorąc pod uwagę cenę - bardzo gorąco polecam! (zwłaszcza, że do 1.01.2015 jest częścią dolarowego progu w obecnym Humble Bundle).

A czym jest Bardbarian ? Zabawnym tower-defense! Niby nic wielkiego, ale wciąga jak odkurzacz :) Wiele dostępnych postaci, ścieżki ulepszeń i rozbudowy miasta oraz grind - po lepsze postacie, dodatki itd itp. 
Sympatyczna grafika. Dżwięk robi się monotonny po jakimś czasie, ale cóż... Za te pieniądze zabawa przednia. Polecam!

author: {'steamid': '76561198043840511', 'num_games_owned': 413, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 823, 'last_played': 1419628569}
review:
This is a fun game. You can play it in a lot of different ways.
Each run you do is different, not because of the enemies because those are stactic, but because you'll learn to change your squad.
One other good thing about this game is that you can also play 2 game modes. One is survival and the other is side-scroll infinite running. Both are great fun.
If this ins't enough to convince you then let's me tell you about the Insane mode too. It's much more aggresive than normal mode but it's also a lot a fun.
If you buy this game you will have good fun. 100% assured.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020976982', 'num_games_owned': 1049, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1425561518}

review: Качественная убивалка времени. Если вам нравится Kingdom Rush, то и эта штука определенно придется по вкусу. Только мы не строим башенки, а нанимаем союзников которые бегают за нами там, где бегаем мы и шмаляют кто чем может. Апгрейды и прокачка в комплекте.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023955213', 'num_games_owned': 2455, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1704753498}
review:
A real fun pick up and play game.  The progression of leveling up abilities for you, the town and your group draws you in for one more go after each failure.

Only minor draw back is the game tells you during the tutorial that its best to play the game with a controller which is fine for me but then when your back in the menus you really need to go back to using mouse controls.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142138359', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1659976787}
review:
Bardbarian lo si può tranquillamente definire un tower defense, ma con una struttura particolare. Infatti vi immedisimerete in un barbaro che grazie alla sua ascia/liuto esegue varie tipologie di assoli che chiameranno truppe di rinforso o attiveranno abilità del personaggio.
Io lo adoro, i comandi sono semplici ma il gioco non lo è per niente, dopo i primi livelli di tutorial diventerà una vera sfida. Andando avanti con il gioco inoltre si sbloccheranno varie truppe, ognuna con le sue caratteristiche.
CONSIGLIATO!

author: {'steamid': '76561198015871120', 'num_games_owned': 720, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1419351407}
review:
Симпатично нарисованный казуальный Tower Defence. Музыкальных композиций по сути две, но в определенные моменты их хочется включить погромче =) Единственным серьезным недостатком игры можно выделить обязательная потребность в  фарме, что может многих оттолкнуть. Поэтому я игру прошел на телефоне. Собственно Steam-версия, скорее всего, просто порт. Так что, рекомендую игру только тем, у кого просто прорва времени. Есть масса других игр в жанре (смотрим в сторону моего любимого Defence Grid, например, или любой другой конкретно ПК игры.

P.S. Небольшой спойлер. Купите сразу золотую гитару =) Сыкономите массу нервов себе.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064783185', 'num_games_owned': 854, 'num_reviews': 275, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1419348224}
review: Es un juego bastante entretenido y de mecánica simple: Sobrevive a oleadas de enemigos invocando a guerreros que luchen por ti. El único punto malo que le veo, al menos bajo mi punto de vista, es que el propio Brad el bárbaro (muy original) no puede atacar, solo invocar y ofrecer mejoras temporales a los aliados. 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198067634165', 'num_games_owned': 560, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1455243334}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970564469', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1419444445}
review:
OK So my wife bought this game and I didn't really know what to expect.  She picked it up and asked me to try it.  At first I thought it was a action game like castle crashers so the first moment in the game I was a little confused.  But it's a really interesting mix of a bunch of different types of games.  No joke I lost 2 days to this game.  Very very very fun.  The progression is really well done in this game too.  There are tons of boosts, upgrades, and characters to unlock.  Very high replayability.  

I've never heard of this game before but really glad my wife picked it up.  Fun stuff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087426594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1419252830}
review:
처음에 게임을 시작하면 아 저 주인공 바바리안으로 몹을 때려잡는 거라고 생각했는데 실상은 제일 쌔보이는 바바리안은 기타만 치고 피리부는 사나이 따라다니는 쥐새끼들 마냥 바바리안을 따라 다니는 잔챙이들이 다 한다. 처음에는 꾀나 몰입이 되서 재미있게 즐겼으나 가면 갈수록 도데체 내가 왜 이걸 하고 있지 라는 생각이 들어서 금방 꺼버렸다. 그래도 돈이 아까워서 몇번 더 게임을 플레이 해 봤으나 너무 질려버려서 그냥 지워버렸다. 만약에 이 게임이 대박 세일을 해서  아주 저렴한 가격으로 구매할 수 있는 기회가 온다면 한번은 플레이를 해보는 것도 괜찮을 것 같다 하지만 이 게임은 일회용 게임이라는 것을 명심하고 구매하기를 바란다.
初めてゲームをプレイするときには確かに興味を感じることができる。しかし、すぐに飽きたのだ。簡単に言えばこのゲームは使い捨てだ。セールをして非常に低価格で購入できるなら1度プレーしてみるのもいい。しかし、あなたもすぐに嫌気が差しだろうと確信する。

author: {'steamid': '76561198042023224', 'num_games_owned': 1596, 'num_reviews': 1031, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1419232427}
review:
직접 유닛들을 데리고 다니면서 몰려오는 적들을 방어하는 조금은 독특한 디펜스 게임.

내가 직접 조종하는 야만음유시인(Bardbarian이라 대충 해석이 이렇게 되야할 것 같다.)을 이용해 직접 적들을 상대할 유닛들을 부르고, 그 유닛들로 결성된 파티를 통해 적들을 물리쳐나간다. 그 외에 공격력 증가, 방어력 증가, 스피드 증가 등의 각종 버프를 걸어주기도 하고 적들을 잠시 기절 상태로 만들어 주기도 한다. 이해가 조금 어렵다면 브루드워의 캐리어를 생각해보면 편하다. 마찬가지로 브루드워 시절에 캐리어 컨트롤 잘 하던 사람들은 이 게임도 어렵지 않게 할 수 있을 것이다.

음악으로 싸운다니까 좀 특이해보일 수 있는데, 사실 처음 보이는 광경은 아니다. 날아라 슈퍼보드의 소나타란 녀석도 있었고. 그리고 무슨 로봇 만화 중에도 있었지. "내 노래를 들어!!!" 라던가. 제작자들이 걸어둔 게임 화면에는 다양한 유닛들로 파티를 구성해놨고, 본 게임도 그렇게 진행해야 할 것 처럼 해놨지만... 현실은 같은 유닛도 얼마든지 계속 뽑는 것이 가능해서. (효율도 이 쪽이 훨씬 좋다.)

게임 자체는 재미있는 편인데, 난이도가 조금 지나치게 쉬운 감이 있다. 맨 처음부터 Insane 난이도로 했는데 시간 좀 지나고 게임 진행 방식 깨닫고나면 게임이 정말 터무니없이 쉬워진다. Insane 난이도 클리어하면 나오는 Day 2가 그나마 어렵고 조금 도전심리를 유발하긴 하지만. 적들의 등장 간격을 조절한다던가 해서 난이도를 조금 올렸어도 괜찮았을 것 같다.

그 밖에 서바이벌 모드나 이스케이프 모드 같은 것도 있고 이런 것도 나름 할 맛이 나게 잘 만들어져있다.
결론은, 난이도가 조금 쉬워서 누구나 부담없이, 편하게 즐길 수 있는 조금은 독특한 디펜스 게임.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007709498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1489949988}
review: I love the soundtrack-- sound effects are amazingly well-integrated with gameplay so the the bard's guitar solos feel native instead of disruptive.  The controller support is great, and the powerups unlocked offer a quick, but complelling reason to keep playing the same waves of monsters in the same setting; ultimately this is a great casual action game for the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158271569', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1428769026}
review:
С виду Брэд (главный герой Bardbarian) – брутальный и недалекий варвар со свирепым нравом и огромным топором, но делать выводы по первому взгляду не стоит. За могучим фасадом скрывается творческая и впечатлительная натура, которой в один прекрасный день надоело рубить в капусту монстров, постоянно наседающих на родной городок. Решив полностью посвятить себя музыке, воитель прицепил к верной секире струны и превратил ее в электрогитару. Играет Брэд, само собой, хеви-метал – в конце концов, варвар он или нет?


    Увы, чудовища упорно продолжают атаковать город, и одной музыкой их не остановить. Однако новоиспеченный бард нашел гениальный выход – вместо него поселение теперь защищают другие отважные герои. Сперва музыкант призывает их с помощью громких и техничных вариаций, а затем ведет получившуюся мини-армию в битву. Глядя на побоище сбоку, мы указываем команде направление движения и подбадриваем ее специальными соло, заставляя яростнее сражаться, быстрее бежать и дольше терпеть боль от ран.

Процесс незамысловат, но требует пристального внимания: нужно уворачиваться от снарядов, собирать выпадающие из убитых ресурсы, держать достаточную для стрельбы дистанцию и не забывать о кристалле в конце единственной городской улочки – если его сломают, пиши пропало. Чтобы эффективнее препятствовать тварям, стоит подбирать себе наиболее подходящих бойцов, поскольку достоинства и недостатки у всех разные. Например, лучники бьют дальше колдунов, зато заклинания ранят куда больнее стрел.

Одновременно Брэд может запомнить только три мелодии призыва, так что собрать универсальный отряд не дадут. Поначалу выбирать особо не из чего – те самые лучники, маги и еще ополченцы, но со временем тут будет куча народу: целители, рыцари со щитами, спасающие группу в ближнем бою, некроманты, поднимающие павших врагов, шаманы с метательными копьями, ниндзя с ворохом сюрикенов… К сожалению, открывать действительно интересные варианты придется очень долго.

Хотя здесь всего один уровень, пусть и условно разбитый на четыре части, с продолжительностью у Bardbarian беда – она неизбежно надоест намного раньше, чем закончится. Причина, как это часто бывает, в бурном «мобильном» прошлом. Сложность растет гигантскими скачками, а единственный способ одолеть заматеревших тварей – активно покупать всевозможные улучшения. Проблема в том, что золота постоянно не хватает. На планшетах игра предлагала поправить дело путем микротранзакций, но владельцы PC этого сомнительного удовольствия лишены.

Остается «гриндить»: до посинения переигрывать осточертевшие начальные отрезки или попытать счастья в дополнительных режимах. Их два, и оба не заслуживают потраченного времени. «Survival» излишне однообразен: мы бегаем по заполненной монстрами площадке, подбираем компаньонов и пытаемся протянуть как можно дольше. «Escape» же – скучный и утомительный «раннер», где наш менестрель гибнет от любой ошибки.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970119710', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1590112595}
review: A glorified flash game. There's some depth there, but in the end it's just to tease you into repeating the same simple gameplay ad-infinitum. author: {'steamid': '76561198015148890', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1492377514}
review:
El mecanismo del juego es básicamente el de un Tower Defense, como ya se ha comentado por aquí, pero con algunos toques que lo convierten en un juego original y con mucho sentido del humor.

Por este precio lo recomiendo totalmente. Un juego ideal para cuando quieres pasar un rato con el ordenador para relajarte con algo divertido. Se aprende jugar muy rápido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105680429', 'num_games_owned': 5132, 'num_reviews': 572, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1562157120}
review: 另类塔防的休闲小游戏，比较耐玩，游戏前期基本都是刷钱为主，为了后期升级打怪不然很难通关，配合了多样化的角色和升级系统，游戏显得格外有趣，加上带感的金属乐，喜欢这类风格游戏的玩家不要错过了~

review: Not a  tower defence game; more like a bullethell game with the addition of hireable drones that follow you and shoot for you. Interesting concept but does not offer more than 2-3 hours of interesting gameplay and is rather grindy past that. If it is more than 75% off on a sale it might be worth, otherwise not.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047467292', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 955, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1447798444}
review:
You play as Brad, the bardbarian (Sorry dyslexics). The goal is simple: defend the town crystal in a wave-defense system. There are quite a few different units to unlock by getting to higher waves. The enemies have a good variation in strength and speed. Art is simple cartoon style, but fits well and goes well with the game and the music is well done. You can also have a pet raccoon. 

Would recommend playing bradbarbadarian.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117295623', 'num_games_owned': 654, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 488, 'last_played': 1436079314}
review:
This game is amazing. The art style in this game is appealing to the eye, and the large selection of classes is a huge bonus. This game should be one that everyone tries at least once. Amazing music, amazing gameplay.

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198073679006', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 1123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 621, 'last_played': 1487990421}
review: Addicting little twin stick shooter game where u have to survive the waves of enemies and survive the day. There is a bit of depth with the upgrades u can buy for your main character then unlock new units and upgrade them as well. Depending which units u choose for your little party can make a big difference on how u play. its not a huge game but well worth the small price tag.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970444572', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1415944578}
review:
Bardbarian is a somewhat fun game that mixes elements of bullet-hell and tower defense.  The gameplay feels interesting, at first, but lacks more than a few hours of gameplay.  I beat the game on Insane difficulty in about 3 hours.  I have basically everything unlocked and maxed except for a few units (which would require grinding for another hour or so).  Even on Insane difficulty, I found myself standing at the front gate killing enemies before they could even get a single shot off.  Eventually you'd hit a wave / boss that's a brick wall and would require you to die and upgrade (sometimes a few times) before you could pass it.  If the developer could smooth out this progression, it would feel much more exciting to play.

Besides all of the cons I've listed above, the game is some sort of Flash port.  I have a gaming PC, and I get about 3 frames per second on the main title in windowed mode.  In fullscreen mode, the main screen doesn't even load and the game crashes.  I spent the first few hours after purchasing this game trying to solve this problem.  The game is littered with other bugs as well.

I would avoid this game, personally, but if you like grindy games, I suppose I could recommend it at $1 or in a bundle somewhere.

2/5 Stars

author: {'steamid': '76561198059528485', 'num_games_owned': 650, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1418576952}
review:
Awesome game.
Defend the tower (or the crystal) with you summons. Play some riffs to bring your summons.
You always start from 'wave1' and work your way up. You can pay (in-game currency) to start at another wave (if you reached that wave already).
You can buy powerups, unlocks summons (some of them from other games), upgrade your 'town'.
Easy gameplay, nice cartoon graphics, nice soundtrack.
It's a funny game.

review:
Bardbarian ist ein sehr gelungener Mix aus TD und einer Art Plattformer. Sehr schöne Ideen in Sachen aufleveln, knackiger Schwierigkeitsgrad und zahreiche Einheiten, wobei nicht alle wirklich hilfreich sind. 
Im Großen und Ganzen ein sehr schönes, kreatives und witziges Spielchen für zwischendurch mit hoher Langzeitmotivation. Empfohlen auch für Leute, die keine absoluten eingefleischten Fans des TD - Genres sind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066271169', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1415595615}
review:
This game is tons of fun! You can easily get lost in it for a good amount of time.

Although It sort of has a grindy feel to it, kill enemies - get coins - die - upgrade - fight more, etc.. It is very fun and can be quite challenging as you get towards the harder enemies before you've upgraded your hero and his units. It is quite rewarding though, as you try to survive and unlock more characters and better stats for your group and battle area. 

Good Fun, Do Recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971201484', 'num_games_owned': 3765, 'num_reviews': 193, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1406457329}
review:
吟遊詩人拯救村莊.
招喚小兵，擊退一波波來襲的敵人
打死敵人後可以獲得金幣，拿這些金幣強化自己的小兵
在往更後面的BOSS推進

整款遊戲就是這樣的TD GAME
嚴格來說其實劇情滿無腦的
但是這款遊戲不只TD，還收入了奔跑.還有死鬥模式

奔跑，橫向移動的模式，後方有黑影壟罩
隨時會把你吞掉，你要不斷地往前跑，躲避敵人
然後撿拾路上的道具，強化自己的隊伍

死鬥，就是地圖上會不斷的出敵人
所有敵人都會淹過來要取妳的小命，如何在敵人之中穿梭
並且撿拾地上的道具強化自身的隊伍，就是這模式的精隨

嚴格來說這款GAME算是一款好GAME
如果在午後時刻閒來無事，倒是很適合把這款GAME在一 個下午給全破完畢

author: {'steamid': '76561198055213311', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1049, 'last_played': 1455547123}
review:
単純明快で面白い。

横スクシューティングゲームの要素とＴＤの要素を上手くマッチさせている。
プレイヤーキャラは直接攻撃することが出来ず、グラディウスのオプションのごとくテクテク付いて来る仲間を召還し
敵や弾を避けつつこちらの攻撃が当たる様に上手く誘導する。これが楽しい。

基本的に死んで、それまで稼いだお金でユニットや街、プレイヤーキャラを少しずつアップグレードして先へ先へと攻略して行きます。
クリア後の２日目は鬼畜モード。
おまけ要素のサバイバルモードや、ただ闇雲に前進するモードもあるよ。
日本語はありませんがゲーム中ストーリーが無いので困らないレベル。

難点を言えば本編のボリューム(ボス４体)とメタルな燃えるＢＧＭの種類がもう少し欲しかった。

複雑なシステムで疲れる重いゲームの合い間に、またテレビを見ながらでも、軽く遊ぶのにオススメです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198032636062', 'num_games_owned': 2817, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1415010769}
review:
Personal Rating: 8 of 10

A different twist to Tower Defense with RPG elements. You basically controls a Bard which summons characters to your side to try and stop incoming waves of enemies. I know this was originally a mobile game but the PC port was great with different resolutions, balanced gameplay (upgrades are purchased with in game earned coins), keyboard supported plus 3 addtional units.

The reason I only gave this game an 8 instead of a full 10 was because I think it still lacked of content such as having more heroes, items, skills or perhaps, longer campaign. After completing the campaign, you can still replay them to earn cash or play the unending mode. The unending mode however automatically resume on the level you last died and it can be frustating specially when you cannot fully summon all units at once to resume but the enemies comes in hordes. 

I do look forward to Bardbarian II with more witty ideas and content to the game from the developers!

author: {'steamid': '76561198018976394', 'num_games_owned': 1692, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 629, 'last_played': 1414916566}
review:
Primero de todo, es una especie de tower defense y segundo, me molan mucho este tipo de juegos, de ir consiguiendo oro para comprar mejoras y cada vez resultarte más fácil hacerlo todo. Pero tiene algo bueno, y es que no se te hace fácil, una vez terminas la campaña, la cual tardarás sus horitas, se te desbloqueará el modo Insane y ahí empieza la fiesta. 

Muchas unidades con sus diferentes ataques cada una, mejoras para el personaje y la ciudad, 4 modos de juego y muy buena música que aunque se repite bastante a lo largo del juego, en ningún momento la he tenido que desconectar porque me estuviese rayando.

Los modos de juego son:
Campaña - 20 oleadas con 4 boses.
Dia 2 - A partir de la oleada 21 y hasta donde puedas llegar.
Infinito - Tipo endless run, corriendo sin parar a ver que record consigues.
Supervivencia - Oleadas de enemigos y no puedes comprar unidades, solo encontrarlas.

No los cuento como modos porque son lo mismo pero más difícil, pero también podríamos añadir lo mismo pero en el modo Insane, donde los enemigos quitan más vida, lanzan más habilidades, se mueven más rápido, aguantan más, etc...

Si tengo que ponerle alguna pega al juego, sería que no tenga un botón como en los Sims para acelerar el tiempo, porque cuando estás desbloqueando las cosas y tienes que repetir una y otra vez misiones para conseguir oro se hace pesado. Y quizá también alguna opcíon para eliminar unidades invocadas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025020070', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 932, 'last_played': 1592183815}

review: I'm not sure why everyone calls this tower defense, since it plainly isn't.  Maybe none of them know what a shmup is.  This is a game where your firing is largely out of your control, but you try to dodge around large numbers of projectiles, while manuevering so that your shooting kills enemies.  This is a very fun take on the schmup genre, that I highly reccomend for the price

author: {'steamid': '76561198010999954', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1422650520}
review:
Not the kind of game I ordinarily would have picked up, but after watching my girlfriend play it I decided to give it a try and I'm glad I did.

Gameplay sort of resembles a tower defense game in that there are hordes of attacking enemies, but instead of placing towers you defending it. You do this by controlling the main character who is a barbarian turned bard (hence the name) who summons a party of characters (of up to three different types) that follow him around and do all the heavy lifting.

Between its humorous nature, the upgrades, and the increasing difficulty it remains enjoyable despite, or maybe because of, its relative simplicity.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994471459', 'num_games_owned': 978, 'num_reviews': 454, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1414046886}
review:
Cheap yet fresh! Like a bag of tomatoes that taste surprisingly sweet.

You are the tower, set up your party and walk around as your buddies listen to your jams and kill the never-ending horde, so it goes.

If you're in the mood for a Tower Defense but are tired of Tower Defense, then play this Defense game. Plus it has Isaac and Meat Boy as a crappy unit: 11/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198124275446', 'num_games_owned': 1852, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1413856695}
review:
Bardbarian is a casual action game with hints of tower defense. I wasn't a huge fan of the game's cartoonish look, but tower defense is my favorite casual genre of game, and I go out of my way to try any game of the genre, whether it claims to add something new or not.

Bardbarian is fun in doses, but it quickly wears out its welcome. It adds something new to the tower defense genre, which is the fact that your "towers" are various characters that you can upgrade and you can influence their actions using music. You also have no stationary units (other than a full upgrade later on in the game where you can have units defend from on top of two buildings), and you are in charge of moving to the enemies and killing them off before they get close to your town center. While this is a new take on the genre, I didn't find that it added much enjoyment gameplay-wise, and in many cases, it turned out to be frustrating. You essentially have three entrances where enemies spawn, and the screen isn't large enough to cover the entire "field", so it's easy to be focusing on defeating enemies on one side of the screen and completely miss enemies coming through on the other side, because they are not visible on screen but only on the mini-map.

One of my favorite things about the tower defense genre is conquering maps and moving onto new challenging maps, and figuring out the best strategies for handling the routes enemies would take. Unfortunately, Bardbarian has one map, and one map only. It's understandable, in a way, because your towers are not stationary, so therefore new maps wouldn't be necessary. However, the game quickly becomes dull and repetitive because your surroundings are never changing. To add insult to injury, this game is one of the biggest grindfests I've ever played. Reading other reviews that state it was developed for phones now that I've played the game makes total sense, because this game sure does play like a phone game. Expect to play the same levels and waves of enemies over and over and over and over in order to save enough gold to buy even some of the most basic upgrades. Also, there are 20 waves of enemies, total, in the game. 20 waves TOTAL, which is equal to about one or two maps in most other tower defense games. The game only saves your level progress at every five levels, so if you don't beat the boss at the ends of levels 5, 10, 15, and 20, don't expect to start back on the level you died on. You have to go all the way back to the beginning of that "section" to try again.

Another issue I find with the game is the fact that your units are so easily killed, even when fully upgraded. Playing through a grindfest of a game to save enough for certain upgrades can be somewhat justified if those upgrades make the player feel as if it was worth it, but upgrading anything--anything, from the Barbarian's own health to his units or the town itself--feels ultimately underwhelming. 

The game also sports a survival mode (with one map to choose from) and an escape mode (one map). Both are ways to post high scores, add small value to the game, and potentially make a little extra gold. Survival mode is fun for a few tries, but escape wasn't really my cup of tea.

In summary, I began this review with the intention on giving the game a "recommended, but only on sale for $2.00 or less," but the more I thought about the game to write this, the more I realized I couldn't justify recommending it. In the end, it's up to you to decide, but I implore those fellow tower defense fans out there to find a different game of the genre to try. Bardbarian removes more enjoyment from the genre than it adds, and to be completely honest, it's possible that tagging this game as tower defense does it an injustice, because I went into this game wanting something that I ultimately did not get. Bardbarian can be fun, but it plays like an action casual phone or online Flash game. If you are willing to pay to purchase it with that in mind, you probably won't be disappointed. Otherwise, I'm sorry, but I cannot recommend this.

Edit 4/29/2016: I've noticed that an abnormal percentage of people have marked this review as unhelpful. As I always try my best to cover all aspects of a game in a review to be helpful to potential consumers, I would appreciate any comments on my review letting me know the information I've left out, or any questions you have about the game which my review left unanswered. I will update the review as applicable. Thank you!

author: {'steamid': '76561198024246936', 'num_games_owned': 5024, 'num_reviews': 194, 'playtime_forever': 797, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 796, 'last_played': 1417729752}
review: Bardbarian is fun, but it's the sort of simple and short-lived fun that makes it difficult to forget that it's a smartphone game at heart. All of the indie game tie-in characters add a flash of whimsy to this casual hybrid of Real Time Strategy and Tower Defense, but it's hard to gloss over the fact that you'll have experienced much of what the game has to offer in about 30 seconds of play. To its credit, the game packs in a lot of things to do in the form of different modes, minigames, and achievements. Unfortunately, the strategy aspect of Bardbarian is very shallow, and you can steamroll through about 98% of this game just by leveling any three units enough. Still, the action is instantly gratifying and the prospect of leveling your abilities to get just that little bit further makes the game addictive for the limited amount of time you'll spend on it. While I'd hardly call this game essential to your library, at the end of the day, I had $5 worth of fun and a good time getting all of the achievements.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087675361', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 729, 'last_played': 1413394314}
review:
Bardbarian è un tower-defense rispettabile. Nonostante sia un porting da mobile, i controlli sono ottimizzati bene, sia tastiera che joypad. Competitivo, ma è soprattutto arduo, sembrerebbe facile... ma non è tutto oro quello che luccica. Infatti il gioco è impegnativo al massimo, e molte volte ti costringerà a rifare tutto dall'inizio, ma non temere: questo è il modo migliore per ottenere più soldi per potenziare tutto, TUTTO. La grafica "fumettosa" inoltre è fighissima, e (giustamente) non richiede troppo, anzi... Paragonandola ad altri titoli del genere indie, potrei dire niente in fatto di risorse.

Lo consiglio si, ma fossi in voi aspetterei qualche offerta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018700498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1207, 'last_played': 1413974191}
review:
Bardbarian est un tres bon jeu dont la difficulté augmente en même temps qu'on fait progresser notre ville et les personnages qui la defendent.
Ce que j'aime le plus dans ce jeu c'est qu'on peut décrocher des accomplissements steam en jouant de façon normale, sans que ce soit pénible ou saoulant.

Le game play est simple mais tres bien réalisé, tres agréable, abouti.

Je recommende ce jeu quand il est en promo à moins de 5€. Franchement c'est un bon jeu sympa et fun à jouer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001502177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1414373451}
review:
After first playthrough (about 1.5hrs), I recommend this game at the $5 price level.  Creative take on the tower defense genre (you and your units are the towers).

Pros:
Funny
Smooth mechanics
Enjoyable graphics
Good, and varied, tech tree/upgardes to customize to your play style
Creative take on the tower defense genre (you and your units are the towers)
Super easy to pick up and play for 15min here or there

Cons:
Shorter/less game time than I expected
Early upgrades are really easy but most units remain locked until later game
Not a free world/sandbox game or mode (which I misinterpreted from the description and video)

author: {'steamid': '76561198056530365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1507040926}
review: The game is enjoyable but seems to follow a model in which you cannot beat the game until you have spent a substantial amount of time in it, and it promotes grinding for money/upgrades. personally I had fun but i cannot reccomend it based on that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043817134', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 945, 'last_played': 1477138073}
review:
Un tower defense addictif et au concept particulier, en effet on contrôle le héros qui peut invoquer des créatures aux pouvoirs variés attaquant les ennemis à proximité, il est donc nécessaire de se déplacer sur la (petite) map. Les créatures/persos invoqués sont upgradables ainsi que diverses autres propriété du héros et de la ville.

Le seul point négatif pourrait être la redondance du décor (hors boss) mais ça lui est largement pardonné au vu des qualités de ce titre.

Je recommande sans hésiter.
